inupiaq: Nagliksaaqtuŋa pisigivlugu quliaqtuaqaġniġa tusaayugaaġiksuanik ilivsiññun, aasii apiġigivsi ipiqtusuutigitquŋił̣ł̣ugu taamna, aglaan qapiŋaisaaġusiaġitquvlugu pisigilugu anniqsuusiaqaŋaniqsi alġaqsruutipkun ilivsiññun.

english: For this reason I kneel before the Father,
inupiaq: Isummatigikapkich tamatkua iluqaisa God-im sivunniuġutigiŋaraŋi, pułłuŋa aŋaiyyuruŋa Aapamun,

english: from whom every family in heaven and on the earth is named.
inupiaq: Aapauruamun iluqaiññun ukpiqtuanun, qiḷaŋmiitkaluaqpata naagga nunamiitpata,

english: I pray that according to the wealth of his glory he may grant you to be strengthened with power through his Spirit in the inner person,
inupiaq: aŋaiyyuvluŋa God-mun inuaŋaitchuamik nagliktuutiqpaqaqtuamun, suaŋŋasipiaġataquvlusi Ilitqusiġiksuaŋanun iḷuvsiññiittuamun iñuuyumiñaqsiḷusi nalaunŋaruakun,

english: that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith, so that, because you have been rooted and grounded in love,
inupiaq: iḷisimanaġumauq Christ iñuutilaaŋa uummativsiññi sivisutilaaŋatun ukpiqsimaaġnivsi. Aŋaiyyummiuŋasuli piviuttaqsriqpaktuagukavsi, kaŋiqsiyumiñaquvlugu piqatigilugich iluqaisa ukpiqtuat iḷitchuġilugu uummativsiññiñ,

english: you may be able to comprehend with all the saints what is the breadth and length and height and depth,
inupiaq: qanutun kamanaqtilaaŋa piviuttaqqutaata Christ-gum uvaptiŋnun. Piviuttaqqutaa kamanaqpaił̣ł̣uni iḷitchuġimmaġiksiyumiñaitkikput iluqaan. Sutun ittuq aktilaaġnaġumiñaipiaqtuatun, ikiqtułhaaqłuni, takiłhaaqłuniḷu qutchił̣haaqłuniḷu itiłhaaqłuniḷu supayaamiñ qiñiqtuuraaġumiñakkaptiŋniñ. Tainnainniġman aŋaiyyutigivsi ataramik iñuutquvlusi nalaupiaġataġlugu God-im iñuutqutaa ilivsiññun.

english: and thus to know the love of Christ that surpasses knowledge, so that you may be filled up to all the fullness of God.
inupiaq: Qanutułhaaq God-im pisiyumiñaġaatigut qaaŋiġḷuguunnii apiqsriaġiyumiñakkaqput naagga qiñiqtuuraaġumiñakkaqput. Taamna ilaan piḷḷagaa Ilitqusiġiksuakun ikayuqtigianikkaptigun ilaan iñuutqutaagun uvaptiŋnun.

english: Now to him who by the power that is working within us is able to do far beyond all that we ask or think,
inupiaq: Iñupayaat isuiḷaamik nanġaġlirruŋ God paŋmapaŋmiñ isagutilugu isuitchuamullu, pisigilugu ilaan aktilaaganignaġumiñaitchuaq kamanautaa iḷisimanaqsiŋaruaq aŋaiyyuliqiruatigullu Christ-kullu.

english: to him be the glory in the church and in Christ Jesus to all generations, forever and ever. Amen.
I, therefore, the prisoner for the Lord, urge you to live worthily of the calling with which you have been called,
inupiaq: Tavraasii uvaŋa, tigutaaqtaq savautivlugu Ataniq, qiññuaġivsi iñuutquvlusi nalliummatiruamik God-im iñuutqutaanun ilivsiññun,

english: with all humility and gentleness, with patience, bearing with one another in love,
inupiaq: kamasaaŋiḷḷusi pikałaktautaiḷḷusiḷu qiñuirrutilusiḷu avanmun, manimmisilusiḷu pimaqłuutivsigun avanmun pisigilugu piviuttaqqutiniqsi.

english: making every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
inupiaq: Ilitqusiġiksuam atipkaġlisi, tutqiutiqaġumausi avanmun.

english: There is one body and one Spirit, just as you too were called to the one hope of your calling,
inupiaq: Qanuq iluqasi atausiurusi, timitun atausiuruatun. Atausiummiuq Ilitqusiġiksuaq, aasii God-im ququaŋammigaasi piqatigiiquvlusi atautchimi annagummanmi.

english: one Lord, one faith, one baptism,
inupiaq: Suli atausiummiuq Ataniq, ukpiġivigikkaŋat iñuich atunim, iḷaŋiutiŋammiut atunim atautchimun paptaiġunmun.

english: one God and Father of all, who is over all and through all and in all.
inupiaq: Suli atausiummiuq God, aapaŋat iñuich iluqaġmiŋ, qaukłiġikkaŋat supayaat, savaktuaq supayaatigun, suli iñuuruaq supayaani.

english: But to each one of us grace was given according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
inupiaq: Tavra Christ aitchuŋagaatigut atausiullaavluta piraksrallaanik supayaanik pitqukkamiñik uvaptiŋnun.

english: Therefore it says, “When he ascended on high he captured captives; he gave gifts to men.”
inupiaq: Taamna sivuniġivlugu, aglausimaruq Bible-ni inna,

english: Now what is the meaning of “he ascended,” except that he also descended to the lower regions, namely, the earth?
inupiaq: Tavraasii Ataniq uqaqsiqł̣ugu uqallautigivsi qapiŋaiqł̣uŋa tavraŋŋaaglaan iñuusiqaŋaipiaquvlusi Jew-guŋitchuatun, isumaqaqtuatun anniqsuutauŋitchuanik,

english: He, the very one who descended, is also the one who ascended above all the heavens, in order to fill all things.
inupiaq: suli kaŋiqsiḷaił̣ł̣utiŋ, qanuq nalupiallaktut uqayunaitchullu. Iliŋich iḷaŋiutiyumiñaitchut iñuutchimun God-im aitchuutaanun.

english: It was he who gave some as apostles, some as prophets, some as evangelists, and some as pastors and teachers,
inupiaq: Suqpagillaiŋagaich unnii iluqaisa kanŋunaqtuat sut, aitchuutigivlutiŋ inmiŋnik qanusipayaamun pigiiḷḷiqunmun, maliġuaqługich isummiutitiŋ qanusipayauramun pigiitchuamun pitchaiḷiraġniaġnatiŋ.

english: to equip the saints for the work of ministry, that is, to build up the body of Christ,
inupiaq: Iḷisaŋaitchusi tainnatchimik iñuutchimik iḷisausiavsigun Christ-kun.

english: until we all attain to the unity of the faith and of the knowledge of the Son of God – a mature person, attaining to the measure of Christ’s full stature.
inupiaq: Nalupqinaitchuq tusaayugaaġiŋagiksi Christ, aasii ilaan maliġuaqtigimmasi iḷisausiaqaŋarusi iḷumun ittuanik Jesus iḷisaurrutiŋiñik.

english: So we are no longer to be children, tossed back and forth by waves and carried about by every wind of teaching by the trickery of people who craftily carry out their deceitful schemes.
inupiaq: Tavraasii aŋalatinŋaiġitchi piḷuksisuguuruanun iñuusiġruavsiññun, pipkaisuuruanun ilivsiññik taimani iñuusiġisuukkavsiññik pigiipiaġataqtuakun inŋaruanik, kipiqsaaqłusi pigiitchuanun sagluqivlusiḷu.

english: But practicing the truth in love, we will in all things grow up into Christ, who is the head.
inupiaq: Nutaaġuqtuksraupiaqtusi kipiġniuġutigikkavsigun isumanivsiññiḷu.

english: From him the whole body grows, fitted and held together through every supporting ligament. As each one does its part, the body grows in love.
inupiaq: Aŋalatittuksraupiaqtusi nutauruamun iñuutchivsiññun savaaguruamun God-im irrusiatun, iñuupkaiyumiñaqtuamun ilivsiññik iḷumutun nalaunŋaruakun piḷuutaitchuakullu.

english: So I say this, and insist in the Lord, that you no longer live as the Gentiles do, in the futility of their thinking.
inupiaq: Tavraasii sagluuŋaiġitchi. Iñupayaaq uqaqtuksraupiaqtuq iḷumun ittuamik ukpiqtuaguqanmiñun, qanuq iluqata atautchimiittugut timaani Christ.

english: They are darkened in their understanding, being alienated from the life of God because of the ignorance that is in them due to the hardness of their hearts.
inupiaq: Qinnaliġuvsi piḷuksisiginagu. Qinnaŋanasi uvluqtutilaaŋatun,

english: Because they are callous, they have given themselves over to indecency for the practice of every kind of impurity with greediness.
inupiaq: tuunġaq piviksraqaqtitauŋitchumauq piḷuksipkaġumiñaġlusi.

english: But you did not learn about Christ like this,
inupiaq: Tavraŋŋaaglaan tigligaqti tigligaŋaiġḷi, aglaan savagli saglutaġautaitchuakun, aitchuutiksranikkumauq piiḷḷiuqtuanun.

english: if indeed you heard about him and were taught in him, just as the truth is in Jesus.
inupiaq: Uqaluqaġnasi anniaġutauruanik iñuŋnun, aglaan uqaluqaġitchi anniqsuutauyumiñaqtuanik sivunmuktuutauyumiñaqtuaniglu, tamatkua tusaaruat uqaluvsiññik anniqsuusiaqaġumaut.

english: You were taught with reference to your former way of life to lay aside the old man who is being corrupted in accordance with deceitful desires,
inupiaq: Suli isumaalluksaaġnagu Ilitqusiġiksuaŋa God-im, qanuq Ilitqusiġiksuaq God-im nalunaiñŋutchiutigiŋagaa pigiliutivlusi, nalupqinaiyautigivlugu uvlumi taivrumani God-im annaktinniaġmasi iluqaaniñ piḷuunmiñ.

english: to be renewed in the spirit of your mind,
inupiaq: Uumiḷuġruutiqaġnasi iḷuvsiññi, piavsayyataiḷḷusiḷu qinnautaiḷḷusiḷu qanaaġutaiḷḷusiḷu, suamaruanik uqaŋaiġḷusiḷu naġġuksruutiŋaiġḷusiḷu,

english: and to put on the new man who has been created in God’s image – in righteousness and holiness that comes from truth.
inupiaq: piaqłuktautiŋaiġḷusiḷu avanmun, nagliksrautiqaġlusiḷu suliqutigiŋaiġutilusiḷu avanmun, God-iptauq suliqutigiŋaiŋammagich itqaumayumiñaiqł̣ugich piḷuutisi pisigivlugu Christ.

english: Therefore, having laid aside falsehood, each one of you speak the truth with his neighbor, for we are members of one another.
Be angry and do not sin; do not let the sun go down on the cause of your anger.
Do not give the devil an opportunity.
The one who steals must steal no longer; rather he must labor, doing good with his own hands, so that he may have something to share with the one who has need.
You must let no unwholesome word come out of your mouth, but only what is beneficial for the building up of the one in need, that it may give grace to those who hear.
And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God, by whom you were sealed for the day of redemption.
You must put away every kind of bitterness, anger, wrath, quarreling, and evil, slanderous talk.
Instead, be kind to one another, compassionate, forgiving one another, just as God in Christ also forgave you.
Therefore, be imitators of God as dearly loved children
inupiaq: God-im tainna piqpagivlusi miqłiqtuliutimmasi ilivsiḷi tainnatun piñiḷuktuksraurusi avanmun, qanuq ilaan piviuttaġivlusi miqłiqtuġigaasi.

english: and live in love, just as Christ also loved us and gave himself for us, a sacrificial and fragrant offering to God.
inupiaq: Piviuttaqqutiqpaqaġitchi allanun iñuŋnun, maliġuaġlugu tuvraaksriutaa Christ piviuttaġivluta aitchuutigiŋaruq inmiñik God-mun tuqutauvluni piḷuutaiġukłuta. Tainna pikami, iviġaŋagaa God, taipkunatun ikipkairuatun niġrutinik aitchuikamiŋ ilaanun.

english: But among you there must not be either sexual immorality, impurity of any kind, or greed, as these are not fitting for the saints.
inupiaq: God-im iñugimmasi allatuqtuksrauŋitchusi, qanusipayaamiglu pigiitchuamik, kaviuqtuksrauŋitchusiḷu suuramik-unnii.

english: Neither should there be vulgar speech, foolish talk, or coarse jesting – all of which are out of character – but rather thanksgiving.
inupiaq: Uqautiqaqtuksrauŋitchusiḷu kanŋunaqtuanik. Uqaqtuksrauŋiñmiusi asiḷiqqutauruanik, suli pigiitchuanik uqaqtuksrauŋitchusi. Aglaan iłuałhaaqtuq nanġaġuvsiuŋ God.

english: For you can be confident of this one thing: that no person who is immoral, impure, or greedy (such a person is an idolater) has any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and God.
inupiaq: Una nalupqinaigisiuŋ, kiñaliqaa allatuqtauruaq isiġumiñaitchuq atanniqsimavianun Christ God-ivlu naagga pigiiḷḷiqirauruaq naaggaunnii kaviuqtauruaq, kaviuġiłhaaqługich iñuiḷḷu sullu God-miñ. Taamna iñuuraqpaqaġniġuruq.

english: Let nobody deceive you with empty words, for because of these things God’s wrath comes on the sons of disobedience.
inupiaq: Kimulliqaa sagluqipkaġnasi iḷumun inŋitchuanik uqaluŋnik, qanuq tamatkua pisigilugich God-im tatavsaġniaġai kamasulaitchuat inmiñik.

english: Therefore do not be partakers with them,
inupiaq: Sagluqinniŋniaqtuanun piqasiqsuutinasi.

english: for you were at one time darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Walk as children of the light –
inupiaq: Ilivsivsauq piḷuusiqiugaġuuŋagaluaqtuasii iñuummatun taaġmi, paŋmapak Atanġum iñugiliutimmasi, piḷuusiqiugaŋaiqsusi, qaummaġmi iñuuruatun. Tavraasii iñuutuiññaqtuksraurusi qaummaġmi.

english: for the fruit of the light consists in all goodness, righteousness, and truth –
inupiaq: Iñuukavsi qaummaġmi, iñuupkaqtitaurusi nakuupiaqtuakun nalaunŋapiaqtuakullu iḷumupiaġlu ittuakun.

english: trying to learn what is pleasing to the Lord.
inupiaq: Iḷitchisaiññaġitchi iñuuniaġniġmik iviġaumasuglugu Ataniq.

english: Do not participate in the unfruitful deeds of darkness, but rather expose them.
inupiaq: Piqasiqsuutinasi iñuŋnun piḷġusiqaqtuanun anniqsuutauŋitchuanik, iñuuvlutiŋ taaqtuami. Aglaan satqummiqsigik piḷġusiġiitchuaŋich qaummaġmun.

english: For the things they do in secret are shameful even to mention.
inupiaq: Qanuq kanŋunaqtut-unnii uqautigisaqtuni piḷġusiŋich nalunautchivḷutiŋ.

english: But all things being exposed by the light are made evident.
inupiaq: Satqummiġuvsigik qaummaum qaummaġigviginiaġai piḷuutiŋich aasii satqummiġḷugich aasii iḷitchuġigumiŋ qanutun killukuapiaġataqtilaamiŋnik, iḷaŋich iḷaanni iñuurraqsiñiaqtut qaummaġmi.

english: For everything made evident is light, and for this reason it says:
inupiaq: Taamna pisigivlugu God uqallaŋaruq Bible-ni inna, “Itiġiñ siñiktii, qimakkich tuqqutauyumiñaqtuat piḷuutitin, aasiiḷi Christ iñuullasipkaġniaġaatin qaummaġmi.”

english: “Awake, O sleeper!
inupiaq: Qaunakłaapiaġitchiasiiñ qanuq iñuutilaavsiññik, isumalluaġiitchuatun iñuktun piŋaiġḷusi aglaan isumaturuatun,

english: Rise from the dead,
inupiaq: atułhamaniaġlugu piviksraq anniqsuunmun, qanuq makkunani uvluni iñugiaktut pigiitchuat piñaiḷutchiqsuutit uvaptiŋnun savautitchaiḷisaavlugu Ataniq.

english: and Christ will shine on you!”
inupiaq: Tavraasii isumalluaġiiññasi, aglaan uvlutuaqpan nalupqinaiġñiḷuksiuŋ tuvraġuglugu suna Atanġum pitqukkaŋa ilivsiññun.

english: Therefore be very careful how you live – not as unwise but as wise,
inupiaq: Suli imiŋasisiqaġnasi taaŋŋaġmik, qanuq taamna piaġiitchuamun pialapiaġataġniġmun ittuq, aglaan Ilitqusiġiksuamun aŋalatittitchi,

english: taking advantage of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
inupiaq: uqaurrutilusi avanmun psalms-nik nanġautiniglu ilitqutchikullu atuutinik, atuġlusi atuutinik, psalms-niglu Ataniġmun iḷuvsiññiñ,

english: For this reason do not be foolish, but be wise by understanding what the Lord’s will is.
inupiaq: ataramik quyyatigilugich supayaat God-mun Aapamun, atqagun Atanipta Jesus Christ.

english: And do not get drunk with wine, which is debauchery, but be filled by the Spirit,
inupiaq: Qiksiksrautiqaqavsi Christ-mun, kamakkutiugaġitchi avanmun.

english: speaking to one another in psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs, singing and making music in your hearts to the Lord,
inupiaq: Nuliaguruasii, kamagisigik uisi, kamagimmatuttauq Ataniq.

english: always giving thanks to God the Father for each other in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ,
inupiaq: Qanuq uiguruaq ataniġnaqutiqaqtuq nuliamiñun Christ-tuttauq ataniġnaqutiqaqtuatun aŋaiyyuliqiruanun, suli Christ ilaa annaurrigigaat aŋaiyyuliqiruat, ilaan timigimmatun itaŋisa.

english: and submitting to one another out of reverence for Christ.
inupiaq: Aŋaiyyuliqiruatun kamakkutiqaqtuatun Christ-mun, tainnatuttauq nuliaguruat kamakkutiqaġlich uimiŋnun supayaatigun.

english: Wives, submit to your husbands as to the Lord,
inupiaq: Uiguruasii, piviuttaġisigik nuliasi, tainnatuttauq Christ piviuttaġimmatun aŋaiyyuliqiruat suli aitchuutigivluni inmiñik pisigivlugich tuqutauvluni.

english: because the husband is the head of the wife as also Christ is the head of the church – he himself being the savior of the body.
inupiaq: Ilaa tainna piŋaruq aŋaiyyuliqiruat ilaaguaqsaqługich God-mun, akuqtuġnaġumiñaqsisaqługich piraksriŋagai paptaiqsautquvlugich kamagilugiḷḷu uqaluŋni.

english: But as the church submits to Christ, so also wives should submit to their husbands in everything.
inupiaq: Ilaa tuquŋammiuq iñuich aŋaiyyuliqiruaġuġlugich ilaan pigiliutisukługich. Niviaqsiaq aŋunmun tuvaaqasiutiruatun ilaan aŋaiyyuliqiruani piḷuutaitqugai naġġunaqtuagiḷḷugich piññaġnaqtuatun niviaqsiatun tuvaaqatiksrautiqaqtuatun salumavluni qanusiḷimaamiñ suaġiirrunmiñ.

english: Husbands, love your wives just as Christ loved the church and gave himself for her
inupiaq: Uiguruat piviuttaġiraksraġigaich nuliatiŋ nanmiñiq timimiktun iḷiḷugich. Iñuk piviuttaqsriruaq nuliamiñik piviuttaġiruq inmiñun.

english: to sanctify her by cleansing her with the washing of the water by the word,
inupiaq: Qanuq qaŋaunnii iñuum uumigiŋaitkaa timini, aglaan pamatchuugaa qaunagivlugulu, Christ-tauq qaunaksrimmatun aŋaiyyuliqiruanik,

english: so that he may present the church to himself as glorious – not having a stain or wrinkle, or any such blemish, but holy and blameless.
inupiaq: qanuq ilaan uvagut timigimmatun itkaatigut atausiŋŋuqatigivluta.

english: In the same way husbands ought to love their wives as their own bodies. He who loves his wife loves himself.
inupiaq: Bible uqaluŋiññi God uqallaŋaruq inna, “Taamna pisigilugu, aŋutim qimaguuniġik aapaniḷu aakaniḷu aasii nayuqsiutivlugu nuliani. Tavra iliŋik malġuuruak atautchisun iñuktun iḷiñiaqtuk.”

english: For no one has ever hated his own body but he feeds it and takes care of it, just as Christ also does the church,
inupiaq: Kamanaqtuaq iḷisaurrun salapqiŋaruq taavrumuuna Bible uqaluatigun tuvaaqatigiikkun, aasiivsauq kaŋiqsigiga sivuniqaqtilaaŋanik Christ-mullu aŋaiyyuliqiruanullu.

english: for we are members of his body.
inupiaq: Suli sivuniqaġmiuq ilivsiññun tuvaaqatigiiksuanun. Aŋutipayaam piviuttaġiraksraġigaa nuliani ilimisun iḷiḷugu, suli nuliaguruam isummatigilluataġlugu uiñi.

english: For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and will be joined to his wife, and the two will become one flesh.
This mystery is great – but I am actually speaking with reference to Christ and the church.
Nevertheless, each one of you must also love his own wife as he loves himself, and the wife must respect her husband.
From Paul and Timothy, slaves of Christ Jesus, to all the saints in Christ Jesus who are in Philippi, with the overseers and deacons.
inupiaq: Ukua tuyuutit qairut ilivsiññun Paul-miñ Timothy-miḷḷu, kivgauruaŋniñ Jesus Christ-mun. Tuyuutaurut iluqaiññun Philippi-miittuanun ilaaguaqtauruanun God-mun ukpiqłutiŋ Christ Jesus-mun, taputivlugich umialiŋnallu tiikallu.

english: Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
inupiaq: God-tiptuq Aapapta Atanġuvlu Jesus Christ tutqiutiqaqtillisi nagliktuusiaqpaqaqtillusiḷu.

english: I thank my God every time I remember you.
inupiaq: Quyyavigisuugiga God-tiga itqalimaaqavsi,

english: I always pray with joy in my every prayer for all of you
inupiaq: ataramik aŋaiyyutipayaamni aŋaiyyutisuugivsi quviasuutiqaqłuŋa,

english: because of your participation in the gospel from the first day until now.
inupiaq: quyyatigivlugu ikayuqavsiŋa savaamni alġaqsruivḷuŋa tusaayugaaġiksuamik uvlumiñqaŋa ukpiliqqaaġataġnivsiññiñ paŋmapaŋmun aglaan.

english: For I am sure of this very thing, that the one who began a good work in you will perfect it until the day of Christ Jesus.
inupiaq: Aasii nalupqisuŋitchuŋa God-im isagutipkaiŋaruam savaaġiksuamik iḷuvsiññi iglaupkaġniaġaa taamna naatiḷġataġlugu qaiñiŋanun aglaan Jesus Christ.

english: For it is right for me to think this about all of you, because I have you in my heart, since both in my imprisonment and in the defense and confirmation of the gospel all of you became partners in God’s grace together with me.
inupiaq: Piviuttaġiqpakkivsi. Nalaunŋaruamik quviasuutiqaġumiñaqtuŋa nalupqigiŋiḷḷusiḷu qanuq piqatigiŋagivsiŋa savaaksrirrutaani God-im paŋmapaglu tigutaaqtaukama tigutaaqtauŋaiñŋaġmalu kukiḷullaŋŋaġma ukpiliqsinniaqługich iñuich tusaayugaaġiksuaq Jesus Christ-kun kisimi annautauyumiñaġnivḷugu, aasii ukpiġiraksraġinivḷugu.

english: For God is my witness that I long for all of you with the affection of Christ Jesus.
inupiaq: God iḷisimaruq iḷumun uqaqtilaamnik uqallakama kipiġniuttaġipiaġnivḷugu nayuqsiutisukłusi, Christ Jesus tainna irrusiqaqtitkaaŋa iḷumni.

english: And I pray this, that your love may abound even more and more in knowledge and every kind of insight
inupiaq: Uvva aŋaiyyutigivsi inna. Aŋaiyyutigivsi piviuttaqqutiliqsaiññaquvlusi, iḷumun ittuaġlu iḷitchuġisaiññaquvlugu, suli nalaunŋaniqsrauruamik sivunniutiksravsiññik,

english: so that you can decide what is best, and thus be sincere and blameless for the day of Christ,
inupiaq: sivuniksraqtaaġiyumiñaqsiḷugu iłuaġniqsrauruaq. Tainna piguvsi, piḷuutiqaġniaŋitchusi pasirauniaŋitchusiḷu Christ qaikpan.

english: filled with the fruit of righteousness that comes through Jesus Christ to the glory and praise of God.
inupiaq: Aasiisuli tainna piguvsi, ataramik iłuatun iñuuniaqtusi supayaakun ikayuqtiqaġlusi Jesus Christ-mik, iñuŋnun nanġaġumiñaqsiḷugu God kamanaqsiḷiġlugulu.

english: I want you to know, brothers and sisters, that my situation has actually turned out to advance the gospel:
inupiaq: Aniqatiitkaa, iḷisimatqugivsi tigutaaqtaunimni piruat uvamnun siamitivsaaqsiññaŋagaat tusaayugaaġiksuaq.

english: The whole imperial guard and everyone else knows that I am in prison for the sake of Christ,
inupiaq: Uvuŋaqamaqaŋa iluqaġmiŋ munaqsrich umialgum igluqpaŋani iluqaġmiglu allat uvaniittuat iḷitchuġiŋarut tigutaaqtautilaamnik pisigivlugu Christ-mun kivgauniġa.

english: and most of the brothers and sisters, having confidence in the Lord because of my imprisonment, now more than ever dare to speak the word fearlessly.
inupiaq: Suli tigutaaqtauniġma qapiŋaiqsaaŋagai aniqatit nalupqisuŋaimmaġiksaaqługich ukpiġunmiŋni Ataniġmun, aasii iqsisaiqsiññaqłutiŋ alġaqsruutigivlugu God-im uqalua sivuuġaŋaiqł̣utiŋ.

english: Some, to be sure, are preaching Christ from envy and rivalry, but others from goodwill.
inupiaq: Iñuich iḷaŋisa alġaqsruutigiŋagaat Christ killuqsraqłutiŋ qanaaġuksiññaqłutiŋ, aglaattauq allat alġaqsruutigiŋagaat pisuutigikł̣utiŋ.

english: The latter do so from love because they know that I am placed here for the defense of the gospel.
inupiaq: Tamatkuali aqulliich alġaqsruirut piviuttaġivluŋa iḷisimavlutiŋ God-mun savaaksriñŋatilaamnik, taluqsraŋaiġḷuŋa uqautigitquvlugu tusaayugaaġiksuaq nalaunŋaruakun.

english: The former proclaim Christ from selfish ambition, not sincerely, because they think they can cause trouble for me in my imprisonment.
inupiaq: Allalli iñuich alġaqsruutigiŋitkaat Christ pipiaġataġlutiŋ, aglaan uvaŋa killuġivluŋa. Tainna alġaqsruirut isumavlutiŋ iłuiḷḷiuqtivsaaġukkaluaqłuŋa tigutaaqtaunnamni.

english: What is the result? Only that in every way, whether in pretense or in truth, Christ is being proclaimed, and in this I rejoice.
inupiaq: Suŋitchuq. Quviasuutigigiga Christ alġaqsruutigiyumiñaġmarruŋ qanusipayaakun piñaġumiñaqtuakun, sunŋutikkaluakun naagga iḷumi nalaunŋaruakun irrusikun. Quviasuutigivsaaġniaġmigiga,

english: Yes, and I will continue to rejoice,
inupiaq: iḷisimavluŋa pisigilugich aŋaiyyurriñisi uvamnik, ikayuusiaġalu Ilitqusiġiksuaŋaniñ Jesus Christ, tigutaaqtauŋaiqsitauniaqtuŋa.

english: for I know that this will turn out for my deliverance through your prayers and the help of the Spirit of Jesus Christ.
inupiaq: Kipiġniupiaġataqtuŋa piyummatigipiaġigalu suuramikunnii inuqtitchisuŋił̣ł̣uŋa piraksriusiamnik Christ-miñ, aglaan ataramik paŋmapak-unnii qapiŋairrutiqapiaġuktuŋa supayaatigun pikkapkun Christ nanġausiaqaquvlugu, iñuugaluaġuma naagga tuqugaluaġuma.

english: My confident hope is that I will in no way be ashamed but that with complete boldness, even now as always, Christ will be exalted in my body, whether I live or die.
inupiaq: Qanuq iñuunimni iñuusiġisutualukkiga savautilugu Christ. Aasii tuqugaluaġuma uvamnun anniqsuutaułhaaġniaqtuq.

english: For to me, living is Christ and dying is gain.
inupiaq: Aglaan iñuuguma anniqsuutauvsaaġumiñaġmiuŋa savaapkun. Nalliaŋnik tigusisausiitchuŋa.

english: Now if I am to go on living in the body, this will mean productive work for me, yet I don’t know which I prefer:
inupiaq: Qanuqsausiitchuŋa, iñuuluŋa naagga ullaglugu Ataniq. Qimagupiaġaluaġiga maani iñuuniq aasii nayuqsiutilugu Christ, qanuq taamna nakuułhaasaktaqtuq.

english: I feel torn between the two, because I have a desire to depart and be with Christ, which is better by far,
inupiaq: Aglaan ilivsi pisigilusi iñuuruksraułhamaaqtuŋa.

english: but it is more vital for your sake that I remain in the body.
inupiaq: Iñuuniaqtilaaġasuli nalupqigiŋitkiga, Iḷisimaruŋa tuqutauniaŋisilaamnik uvani tigutaaġviŋmi. Iñuuniaqtuŋasuli ikayuġuglusi suaŋasiḷaaġuglugu quvianaqsiḷaaġuglugulu ukpiġurri.

english: And since I am sure of this, I know that I will remain and continue with all of you for the sake of your progress and joy in the faith,
inupiaq: Aasii pisigilugu tigutaaqtauŋaiġñiġa utaqqiguvsi atqunaġlugu nanġaġniaġiksi Christ Jesus.

english: so that what you can be proud of may increase because of me in Christ Jesus, when I come back to you.
inupiaq: Uvva una naumałhaaqtuq. Iñuuruksraupiaqtusi Christ iñuutqutaatun iñuŋmiñun, uvaŋa tautukkaluaġuvsi naagga tautuŋitkaluaġuvsi, tusaayumiñaġumauŋa atipiaġataqłusi iñuutilaavsiññik atausiq sivuniġivlugu una, taluqsraŋaiqł̣usi quliaqtuaġitilaaŋanik tusaayugaaġiksuaq iñuich ukpiqtirrutiksraŋat God-mun.

english: Only conduct yourselves in a manner worthy of the gospel of Christ so that – whether I come and see you or whether I remain absent – I should hear that you are standing firm in one spirit, with one mind, by contending side by side for the faith of the gospel,
inupiaq: Iqsitchaktinnasi akiḷḷiḷiqsuqtivsiññun. Qulluaŋairrutivsi qanuqpisiiḷḷiñiaġai suksraunġiqsauniaqtilaaŋannik, suli ilivsi annaurrauyumaaqtilaavsiññik, qanuq God-im akimmasiġaasi.

english: and by not being intimidated in any way by your opponents. This is a sign of their destruction, but of your salvation – a sign which is from God.
inupiaq: Qanuq Christ ukpiġumiñaqsigiññaŋaitkaasi inmiñun aglaallu nagliksautigipkaġumiñaqsivḷuni ilivsiññun.

english: For it has been granted to you not only to believe in Christ but also to suffer for him,
inupiaq: Tavra iḷaalliutiyumiñaqsiŋarusi uvamnun qapiyaiḷḷusi quliaqtuaġiguvsiuŋ tusaayugaaġiksuaq. Aŋuyaŋniqtun taamna ittuq qiñiġaġikavsiŋa qaŋapak qulluaŋaitchuaŋaa suli tusaavlusiḷu paŋmapak-unnii qapiyaisilaamnik.

english: since you are encountering the same conflict that you saw me face and now hear that I am facing.
Therefore, if there is any encouragement in Christ, any comfort provided by love, any fellowship in the Spirit, any affection or mercy,
inupiaq: Tavra uvagut atausiŋŋuqatigiŋavlugu Christ qapiŋaisaaġutiyumiñaqtugut avanmun, suli Christ piviuttaqqutaata ikayuutipkaqtaġumiñaġmatigut avanmun, suli piqasiutiŋavluta Ilitqusiġiksuamun nagliktuutiraġaġumiñaqsiŋavlutalu avanmun iḷunŋusuutikullu,

english: complete my joy and be of the same mind, by having the same love, being united in spirit, and having one purpose.
inupiaq: quviatchaksapiaġataqsiŋa isummasiñiglusi uvaptun, piviuttaqqutilusi avanmun atunim, atisiŋalusi ilitqutchivsiññi isumavsiññiḷu.

english: Instead of being motivated by selfish ambition or vanity, each of you should, in humility, be moved to treat one another as more important than yourself.
inupiaq: Siŋñatiqaġnasi piġuqtiġnasiḷu aglaan kamasaaġutaiḷḷusi avanmun, isumaqaŋaiġḷusi nakuułhaaġasugalusi allaniñ iñuŋniñ.

english: Each of you should be concerned not only about your own interests, but about the interests of others as well.
inupiaq: Ilivsiññun kisian kipiġniuġutigiŋaiġḷusi, aglaallu allat iñuich kipiġniuġutilugich.

english: You should have the same attitude toward one another that Christ Jesus had,
inupiaq: Isumaqaqtuiññaqtuksraurusi Christ Jesus isumaqausiatun.

english: who though he existed in the form of God
inupiaq: Jesus Christ Iġñiq taimaŋŋaqaŋa God-tauruaq Aapamisun, ilaan taamna tainna irrusiñi piġuqtiġutigiŋaitkaa atiqasiutiniaġluni God-mun.

english: did not regard equality with God
inupiaq: Aglaan inmiñik pisuksiññaqłuni ilaan atuŋisaallaŋagaa God-mun nalliummatinini, aasii kamanaiqł̣uni kivgaġuŋaruq. Ilaa aniŋaruq aakamiñ iñuktun, qiññaqanikłuni iñugruiññatun.

english: as something to be grasped,
inupiaq: Aasii iñuguqami kamasaaŋił̣ł̣uni kamagiŋagaa God supayaakun, tuquvluni unnii kikiaktuurrauvluni aŋarrauramun pitquranik navguiritun.

english: but emptied himself
inupiaq: Taamna pisigivlugu God-im atqunaqługu kamanaqsipkaŋagaa suli atchiqł̣ugu atiġmik kamanałhaaqtuamik atipayaaniñ,

english: by taking on the form of a slave,
inupiaq: iluqaġmiŋ qiḷaŋmiittuat nunamiittuallu nunam ataaniittuallu sitququvlugich qiksiksrautikun Jesus-mun.

english: by looking like other men,
inupiaq: Suli iluqaġmiŋ iñuich iḷisimanaqsiḷugu uqallausiġiniaġaat Jesus Christ Atanġuniḷugu. Tainna pikparruŋ God-tauq Aapa nanġaqtauniaġmiuq.

english: and by sharing in human nature.
inupiaq: Tavraasii piviuttaġikkavsii, kamagisuuŋakavsiŋa nayuqavsi, naumałhaaqtuq kamagiugaġuvsiŋa nayuqtigiŋitkaluaqtillusi uvamnun. Iñuusitchi uvluutiraġimmasi qanuq annaurrauŋaruat iñuutqusiaŋatiktun, kamagiugaġlugu God qiksigilugu atqunaq, sivuuġagilugu kamaksriŋiññiksraqsi ilaanik.

english: He humbled himself,
inupiaq: Qanuq God savaktuq iḷuvsiññi piyummasiqsuqłusi sunik ilaan pitqukkaġmiñik suli taŋŋiqsillavlugich.

english: by becoming obedient to the point of death
inupiaq: Supayaat pisigik uqaalaŋaiġḷusi naagga qapiqtaiḷḷisigiŋaiġḷugich,

english: – even death on a cross!
inupiaq: pasiñaġumiñaitchumausi iḷumutuuqtuagulusiḷu God-im miqłiqtuŋi, qanuqinniġausiaksraiḷḷusi iñuullavsi akunġanni pigiitchuat uniuŋaruallu iñuich. Akunġanni tainnatchich iñuich taaqtuatun ittuat, ilivsi qaummaġiksuksraurusi qaummatitun,

english: As a result God exalted him
inupiaq: quliaqtuaġutilugich iliŋich God-im uqaluŋiñik iñuupkaiḷḷaruanik. Tainna piguvsi, quviasuutigiyumiñaġniaġivsi Christ qaġġivia uvluq tikitpan, iḷitchuġiluŋa savaaġa ilivsiññi anniqsuutauŋatilaaŋanik.

english: and gave him the name
inupiaq: Tuqutauyumaaġaluaġumaunnii, quyaruŋa quviasuqatigigivsiḷu iluqasi. Qanuq aŋaiyyuliqsiqpaum kuvviqivlugu naimasuġnaqsiḷaaġmatun ikipkaun ikipkaiviŋmi, tainnatulli auga maqigumi iḷḷatauniaġmiuq ukpiġutivsiññun akuqtuġnaġumiñaqsiḷaaġutauluni aitchuun God-mun.

english: that is above every name,
inupiaq: Tainnatulli ilivsi quyaruksraummiusi, suli quviasuutivsiññi piqatigiluŋa.

english: so that at the name of Jesus
inupiaq: Atanġum Jesus pisuutigikpagu, piyummatigigiga tilisukługu Timothy ilivsiññun qilamipayaaq, quviasaaqtausukłuŋa tusaalluataġuma ilivsigun.

english: every knee will bow
inupiaq: Piitchuŋa allamik iñuŋmik Timothy-tun ittuamik, kipiġniupiaġataġluni uŋiarrisaqaġniaqtuamik anniqsuġumavlusi.

english: – in heaven and on earth and under the earth –
inupiaq: Iñuich maani allat iluqaġmiŋ qaunagigaich ilaisa kipiqqutitiŋ, qaunagiŋaiqł̣ugich kipiġniuġutit Jesus Christ-kun.

english: and every tongue confess
inupiaq: Aglaan Timothy-m nalliummatiniŋa iḷisimagiksi savaqasiqsuġmaŋa alġaqsriuñiġmi tusaayugaaġiksuamik. Savaqasiqsuŋagaaŋa iġñiqtun savaqatauruatun aapamiñun.

english: that Jesus Christ is Lord
inupiaq: Tavraasii tiliyumaaġiga ilivsiññun iḷitchuġipqauraġuma qanuqtauniaqtilaamnik,

english: to the glory of God the Father.
inupiaq: aasii ukpiġigiga Ataniq uvaŋaptauq qaiñiaqtilaamnik qilamipayaaq.

english: So then, my dear friends, just as you have always obeyed, not only in my presence but even more in my absence, continue working out your salvation with awe and reverence,
inupiaq: Isummatigiŋagiga tiliraksraġipiaqługu ilivsiññun Epaphroditus aniqatikput savaqatiga aŋuyaqatigalu, ilivsivsauq kivgaqsi savaktitaqsi ikayuqtigipkaqługu uvamnun,

english: for the one bringing forth in you both the desire and the effort – for the sake of his good pleasure – is God.
inupiaq: ilaan kipiqqutigimmigaasi tautugukłusi iluqasi, suli isumaaluŋammiuq tusaaŋaniqavsi naŋitilaamiñik.

english: Do everything without grumbling or arguing,
inupiaq: Naŋipiaġataŋaruq tuquqqayaqtaallaġmi. Aglaan God-im nagligiŋagaa, kisianami nagligiŋitkaa aglaan uvaŋalu, iḷaanni isumaaġutiqavsaaġasugaluŋa.

english: so that you may be blameless and pure, children of God without blemish though you live in a crooked and perverse society, in which you shine as lights in the world
inupiaq: Kipiġniuttaġiłhaaġiga tilisukługu quviatchaquvlusi taututqikkuvsiuŋ, aasiiḷi uvaŋa isumaaluutaiġḷuŋa.

english: by holding on to the word of life so that on the day of Christ I will have a reason to boast that I did not run in vain nor labor in vain.
inupiaq: Paġlayumagiksi quviasuutiqpakun paġlammatuttauq allat ukpiqtuaguqatisi. Suli isummatigilluataġaġusigik iñuich ilaatun ittuat,

english: But even if I am being poured out like a drink offering on the sacrifice and service of your faith, I am glad and rejoice together with all of you.
inupiaq: qanuq ilaan tuqqutigiqqayaŋagaa savaani Ataniġmun, anayasaaqługu iñuggunni naatinniaqługu savaaqsi uvamnun.

english: And in the same way you also should be glad and rejoice together with me.
Now I hope in the Lord Jesus to send Timothy to you soon, so that I too may be encouraged by hearing news about you.
For there is no one here like him who will readily demonstrate his deep concern for you.
Others are busy with their own concerns, not those of Jesus Christ.
But you know his qualifications, that like a son working with his father, he served with me in advancing the gospel.
So I hope to send him as soon as I know more about my situation,
though I am confident in the Lord that I too will be coming to see you soon.
But for now I have considered it necessary to send Epaphroditus to you. For he is my brother, coworker and fellow soldier, and your messenger and minister to me in my need.
Indeed, he greatly missed all of you and was distressed because you heard that he had been ill.
In fact he became so ill that he nearly died. But God showed mercy to him – and not to him only, but also to me – so that I would not have grief on top of grief.
Therefore I am all the more eager to send him, so that when you see him again you can rejoice and I can be free from anxiety.
So welcome him in the Lord with great joy, and honor people like him,
since it was because of the work of Christ that he almost died. He risked his life so that he could make up for your inability to serve me.
Finally, my brothers and sisters, rejoice in the Lord! To write this again is no trouble to me, and it is a safeguard for you.
inupiaq: Tavraasii aniqatiitkaa, quviasuutigisiuŋ Ataniq, Tuyutqigaġniq ilivsiññun pitqigaqługich sivuani tuyuutigiŋaratka ilivsiññun piḷaiġñaitchut uvamnun, anayanaiyautaugiññaqtut ilivsiññun.

english: Beware of the dogs, beware of the evil workers, beware of those who mutilate the flesh!
inupiaq: Quviqtaiḷisitchi iñuŋniñ pigiiḷḷiqiruaniñ, taigitka qimmiñik, iñuich uqaqtuat nalunaigutchigaksraunivḷusi timivsiññi annaurrauniaġuvsi.

english: For we are the circumcision, the ones who worship by the Spirit of God, exult in Christ Jesus, and do not rely on human credentials
inupiaq: Uvagut iḷumun God-im miqłiqtuġigaatigut pisigisuŋaġnagu timivut nalunaiñŋutchiŋaniḷugich, aglaan savautivlugu God ilaan Ilitqusiġiksuaŋan ikayuqłuta, suli nanġaqługu Jesus Christ iñuggutiqaqtitchiruaq isuitchuamik. Ukpiŋitchugut qaałhiñakun piraġausiñun annautiniaġniḷuta.

english: – though mine too are significant. If someone thinks he has good reasons to put confidence in human credentials, I have more:
inupiaq: Tavra kiñaliqaa annaurrauyumiñaġniqpan pisigilugu Jew-gunini, qaałhiñakullu piraġautchich kamagilugich, nalupqisuŋił̣haaġayaqtuŋa annaurrauniaqtilaamnik allaniñ iñuŋniñ.

english: I was circumcised on the eighth day, from the people of Israel and the tribe of Benjamin, a Hebrew of Hebrews. I lived according to the law as a Pharisee.
inupiaq: Nalunaiñŋutchiqsauŋaruŋa anikama tallimat piŋasuni uvlianikama. Israelite-guruŋa aniñipkun, maŋŋuġivlugu Benjamin, auga allamik avuiḷaaq Hebrew-piaġataq. Kamagiŋagitka Jew-guruat pitquraŋich qaunakłaapiaqłuŋa Pharisee-guvluŋa.

english: In my zeal for God I persecuted the church. According to the righteousness stipulated in the law I was blameless.
inupiaq: Suli kipiġniuqpaił̣ł̣uŋa iñupayaanun kamagitquvlugich pitqurat nagliksaaqtinŋagitka aŋaiyyuliqiruat. Iñuk qanutun nalaunŋasiyumiñaqtigiŋakpan kamagilugich pitqurat piraksriutiŋich, pasiñaġumiñaiñŋaruŋa.

english: But these assets I have come to regard as liabilities because of Christ.
inupiaq: Aglaan tamatkua isummatigisuuŋaratka anniqsuutaunasugalugich annaurrauniksrapkun paŋmapak isummatigiliġitka piñaiḷutauvlugich annaurrauniksramun, qanuq Christ kisimisualuk annautigaaŋa.

english: More than that, I now regard all things as liabilities compared to the far greater value of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord, for whom I have suffered the loss of all things – indeed, I regard them as dung! – that I may gain Christ,
inupiaq: Isummatigiłhiñaŋiñmigitka tainna tamatkua kisiisa, aglaallu supayaat suksraallapiaġitka anniqsuutauŋaiqł̣ugich urriqatausaqpata anniqsuutaułhamaaqtuamun iḷitchuġivlugu Jesus Christ uvaŋa Ataniġa. Ilaa pisigivlugu isummatigiliġitka tamatkua iluqaisa iktaksratun, igiłługich anniqsuutauyumiñaiñmata, pigisukługu Christ,

english: and be found in him, not because I have my own righteousness derived from the law, but because I have the righteousness that comes by way of Christ’s faithfulness – a righteousness from God that is in fact based on Christ’s faithfulness.
inupiaq: suli atausiŋŋuqatigisupiallakługu. Tavraŋŋaaglaan isumaqaŋaiqsuŋa uvamnik nalaunŋasiyumiñaġluŋa sivuġaani God-im kamagiugaqsiññaġlugich pitquraŋi. Paŋmapak akuqtuġumiñaqsigaaŋa God-im qanuq ukpiġigiga Jesus Christ. God-im nalaunŋasipkaġaaŋa sivuqqamiñi ukpiġikapku Jesus Christ.

english: My aim is to know him, to experience the power of his resurrection, to share in his sufferings, and to be like him in his death,
inupiaq: Pigisutualukkiga iḷitchuqsriñiq Christ-mik aunniummaġiksiḷugu, suli iḷisimallasiḷugu iḷumni suaŋŋan aŋipkaiŋaruaq tuqqunmiñ ilaanik, suli iḷaŋiutiluŋa nagliksaaqtirrusiaŋiñiñ, nagliksaaqtitauluŋa ilaa pisigilugu, tuquyumaluŋa ilaatun,

english: and so, somehow, to attain to the resurrection from the dead.
inupiaq: qakugukpan aŋipkaqtitauyumiñaġumauŋa tuqqunmiñ iñuggunmun.

english: Not that I have already attained this – that is, I have not already been perfected – but I strive to lay hold of that for which Christ Jesus also laid hold of me.
inupiaq: Uqallautiga sivuniqaŋitkiga naamasipiaġataŋaniḷuŋa ataramik iñuullasiḷuŋa Christ-tupiaġataq, aglaan siġġaqiruŋasuli Christ Jesus-tun iḷisaiññaġukłuŋa qanuq taamna pisigivlugu ilaan annautiŋagaaŋa.

english: Brothers and sisters, I do not consider myself to have attained this. Instead I am single-minded: Forgetting the things that are behind and reaching out for the things that are ahead,
inupiaq: Aniqatiit, iḷisimaruŋa tainnaiḷiŋaisilaamnik-suli. Atausiq sivuniġiliutiŋagiga iñuusimñi, itqaumaŋaiġukługich iluqaisa sivuani piŋaratka, aasii paŋmapaŋmiñaglaan pisuqtilaaġluŋa iñuulluatapiaġniaġluŋa Christ-tun.

english: with this goal in mind, I strive toward the prize of the upward call of God in Christ Jesus.
inupiaq: Aqpaliurraqtitun siġġaqiruŋa sivunmun tikitqaurraqługu killi, akiññaktaaġisukługu iñuuniksraq paŋmani. Taamna pisigivlugu God-im ququaŋagaaŋa Christ Jesus-kun.

english: Therefore let those of us who are “perfect” embrace this point of view. If you think otherwise, God will reveal to you the error of your ways.
inupiaq: Tainnauvva iluqata isumaqaqtuksraugaluaqtugut, iluqata agliraksraiŋaruaguut ukpiqtuaguniptiŋni. Aglaattauq iḷasi isumaqaqpata allauruamik, God-im sivuniqsipkaġniaġmigaasi uqalutka nalaunŋatilaaŋannik.

english: Nevertheless, let us live up to the standard that we have already attained.
inupiaq: Qanupayaaq taamna isummatigigaluaġuvsiuŋ, pisuqtilaavsisun iñuulluataġniḷugitchi paŋmapak kaŋiqsisilaavsisun qanuq God-mun nalaunŋaruakun iñuutqutilaavsiññik.

english: Be imitators of me, brothers and sisters, and watch carefully those who are living this way, just as you have us as an example.
inupiaq: Aniqatiit, iluqasi tuvraqsiŋa nalaunŋaruakun iñuuniaġusimñi. Iñuusiġa naipiqtuutauli iñuŋnun iḷisimanaġumiñaqsiḷugich kisuutilaaŋat iḷumutun ukpiqtuaguruat,

english: For many live, about whom I have often told you, and now, with tears, I tell you that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ.
inupiaq: qanuq iñugiaktuat iñuich iñuusiqaqtut akiḷḷiḷiqsuġmatun pivḷugu Christ tuqqutaa aŋarraurami. Uqautiŋagivsi tainnaittuanik iñuŋnik sivuani, aasii paŋmapak uqallautivsaaġivsi qulvisigivlugich.

english: Their end is destruction, their god is the belly, they exult in their shame, and they think about earthly things.
inupiaq: Kaŋŋiññiaqtut nagliksaaġviŋmun god-tiqaqtut timimiŋ pisuguukkaŋiññik, kamasaaġutigigaich kanŋugiraksraġaluatiŋ, isumagiqpaksiññaqługich nunamiŋŋaqtauruat sut.

english: But our citizenship is in heaven – and we also await a savior from there, the Lord Jesus Christ,
inupiaq: Aglaan uvagut aimaaġviksrautigigikput qiḷak. Tatpaŋmaŋŋa niġiugipiaġikput utiġumaaqtuaq Ataniq Jesus Christ annaurrikput.

english: who will transform these humble bodies of ours into the likeness of his glorious body by means of that power by which he is able to subject all things to himself.
inupiaq: Ilaan allaŋŋuġniaġai tuqusuuruat timivut iḷipkaqsaġlugich ilaan aŋipkaqtauŋaruatun timimisun, suaŋŋatikun atanniqsimapkaiḷḷasiruakun ilaanik supayaanun.

english: From Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, and Timothy our brother,
inupiaq: Ukua tuyuutit qairut ilivsiññun Paul-miñ tilirauruamiñ alġaqsruitquvlugu tusaayugaaġiksuanik God-im pitqummani, Timothy-miḷḷu aniqatiptiŋniñ.

english: to the saints, the faithful brothers and sisters in Christ, at Colossae. Grace and peace to you from God our Father!
inupiaq: Tuyuutaurut ilivsiññun ilaaguaqtauruanun God-mun, atausiŋŋuqatauŋaruanun Christ-mun, aniqatinun ukpiġnaqsiŋaruanun ilaanun Colossae-miittuanun, God Aapavut nagliktuutiqpaqaġlisuq tutqiutiqaqtillusiḷu.

english: We always give thanks to God, the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, when we pray for you,
inupiaq: Aŋaiyyutikavsi quyyavigisuugikput God ataramik, Aapaŋa Atanipta Jesus Christ.

english: since we heard about your faith in Christ Jesus and the love that you have for all the saints.
inupiaq: Qanuq tusaaŋagikput ukpiġnaqsiŋaniqsi Christ Jesus-mun piviuttaqsriñiqsiḷu iluqaiññik ilaaguaqtauruanik God-mun.

english: Your faith and love have arisen from the hope laid up for you in heaven, which you have heard about in the message of truth, the gospel
inupiaq: Aasii tainna iñuusiqaqtusi, iñuuqatigiyumavlugu God qiḷaŋmi isuitchuamun. Taamna piyumman pigiliutiqqaaŋagiksi iḷumun ittuaq tusaayugaaġiksuaq alġaqsruutaumman ilivsiññun.

english: that has come to you. Just as in the entire world this gospel is bearing fruit and growing, so it has also been bearing fruit and growing among you from the first day you heard it and understood the grace of God in truth.
inupiaq: Taamna tusaayugaaġiksuaq alġaqsruutauŋaruaq ilivsiññun alġaqsruutaummiuq iñuŋnun nunami iluqaani, aasii iñuvsaat ukpiliqł̣utiŋ Christ-mun, iñuugaqsivḷutiŋaasii Christ iñuutqutaagun, ilivsivsauq iñuusivsisun taimaŋŋaqaŋa tusaakavsiuŋ nagliktuutiqpaŋa God-im, kaŋiqsivḷugu iḷumun ittuaŋa.

english: You learned the gospel from Epaphras, our dear fellow slave – a faithful minister of Christ on our behalf –
inupiaq: Iḷisaaġiŋagiksi taamna tusaayugaaġiksuaq Epaphras-miñ piviuttaġikkaptiŋniñ kivgauqatiptiŋniñ Christ-mun. Ilaa ukpiġnaqtuq savakti Christ-mun alġaqsruiruaq ilivsiññun pisivluŋa.

english: who also told us of your love in the Spirit.
inupiaq: Ilaan quliaqtuaġutiŋagaatigut Ilitqusiġiksuamun piviuttaqsripkaġnivḷusi allanik iñuŋnik.

english: For this reason we also, from the day we heard about you, have not ceased praying for you and asking God to fill you with the knowledge of his will in all spiritual wisdom and understanding,
inupiaq: Taimaŋŋaqaŋa uvlumiñ tusaaviptiŋniñ taavrumiŋa, aŋaiyyutigivsi-suli, apiġivlugu God ataramik ikayuquvlusi iḷitchuġipiaquvlugu qanuq God-mun pitqutilaaqsi, Ilitqusiġiksuamun isumatusipkaquvlusi kaŋiqsipkaquvlusiḷu sumik God-im pitquyumakkaŋanik ilivsiññun.

english: so that you may live worthily of the Lord and please him in all respects – bearing fruit in every good deed, growing in the knowledge of God,
inupiaq: Suli aŋaiyyutivlusi iñuusiqaquyumavlusi nalliummatiruamik Ataniġmun, iviġaumalugu Ataniq supayaanik piguvsi, ataramik nakuurualiqilusi suli iḷitchuġisaiññaġlugu God.

english: being strengthened with all power according to his glorious might for the display of all patience and steadfastness, joyfully
inupiaq: Aŋaiyyutivlusiḷu God-mun suaŋŋatiqapiaġataqtuamun, suaŋŋasiquvlusi naamaruamik, igḷutuġumiñaqsiḷugich uuktuaġusiapayaat qiñuirrutiqaġlusi, quviasuunmiglu.

english: giving thanks to the Father who has qualified you to share in the saints’ inheritance in the light.
inupiaq: Suli aŋaiyyutivlusi quyyatiqaquvlusi ataramik Aapamun nallium matipkaliġmatigut piqataullasivḷuta allanun ukpiqtuanun iñuggunmi isuitchuami, iñuummatun qaummaġmi.

english: He delivered us from the power of darkness and transferred us to the kingdom of the Son he loves,
inupiaq: God-im annautiŋagaatigut atanniqsimmataaniñ Tuunġaum, iñuummatun ittuamiñ taaqtuami, nuurrutivluta atanniqsimmataanun Iġñiġmi piviuttaġirami.

english: in whom we have redemption, the forgiveness of sins.
inupiaq: God-im Iġñiŋata tasuŋagaatigut God-mun suliqutigiŋaiquvlugich itqaumayumiñaiġḷugich piḷuutivut.

english: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn over all creation,
inupiaq: Christ God-itun ittuq tautugnaitchuatun. Ilaa inŋaruq sivuanni supayaat savaaguŋaiñŋaisa.

english: for all things in heaven and on earth were created by him – all things, whether visible or invisible, whether thrones or dominions, whether principalities or powers – all things were created through him and for him.
inupiaq: Ilaa God-itun ittuq qanuq ilaagun supayaat savaaguŋarut, sut qiḷaŋmiittuat sullu nunamiittuat, sut tautugnaqtuat sullu tautugnaitchuat, tamatkua ilitqutchich atanniqsimanniktuat, ilitqusiḷḷu suaŋŋatiqaqtuat sapiġñaqtuallu. Tamatkua iluqaisa Christ savaŋagai inmiñuksrivḷugich.

english: He himself is before all things and all things are held together in him.
inupiaq: Christ inŋaruq sivuanni supayaat, aasii ilaan suaŋŋataata igliqtitkai atautchikun piqatigiikł̣ugich supayaat savaani.

english: He is the head of the body, the church, as well as the beginning, the firstborn from among the dead, so that he himself may become first in all things.
inupiaq: Suli iñuk niaquata aŋalanmatun timaa, tainnatun Christ aŋalatkai ilaan iñuŋni aŋaiyyuliqiruat. Aŋaiyyuliqiruat ilaan iñuggutiqaqtitkai isuitchuamik, aŋiqqaaŋavluni tuqqunmiñ aasii iñuuvluni isuitchuamun. Tavraasii ilaa Atanġuruq supayaanun,

english: For God was pleased to have all his fullness dwell in the Son
inupiaq: qanuq God sivunniŋaruq tamatkiġḷuni ilaa iñuusukłuni ataramik Iġñiġmiñi.

english: and through him to reconcile all things to himself by making peace through the blood of his cross – through him, whether things on earth or things in heaven.
inupiaq: Suli Christ maqipkaġmagu auni, tuquvluni aŋarraurami, God-im iḷauraaliuŋagai aŋuyautaiqł̣ugich supayaat savaani, nunamiittuat qiḷaŋmiittuallu.

english: And you were at one time strangers and enemies in your minds as expressed through your evil deeds,
inupiaq: Suli qaŋauvlugu ilivsi uŋasiŋarusi God-miñ. Uumigiŋagiksi, iñuuvlusi piḷuutini.

english: but now he has reconciled you by his physical body through death to present you holy, without blemish, and blameless before him –
inupiaq: Paŋmapak-aasii Christ iḷauraaliuŋagaasi God-lu, aitchuutigivlugu timini tuqutautquvlugu aŋarraurami, ilivsi akuqtuġnaqsitquvlusi God-mun, piḷuutaiqsauŋalusi, pasiñaġumiñaiŋalusiḷu ilaan sivuġaani.

english: if indeed you remain in the faith, established and firm, without shifting from the hope of the gospel that you heard. This gospel has also been preached in all creation under heaven, and I, Paul, have become its servant.
inupiaq: Aglaan ukpiŋaiqsuksrauŋitchusi, ukpiġutiqaġitchi suaŋapiaqtuamik, tuniqsimaruamik, suli niġiugiŋaiġñagu annaurrauniksraqsi taŋŋiqsauniaqtilaaŋanik tusaaŋakkavsisun tusaayugaaġiksuakun. Taamna tusaayugaaġiksuaq alġaqsruutauŋaruq iñupayaamun nunamiittuamun, aasii uvaŋa Paul alġaqsruutigigiga.

english: Now I rejoice in my sufferings for you, and I fill up in my physical body – for the sake of his body, the church – what is lacking in the sufferings of Christ.
inupiaq: Paŋmapak quviasuktuŋa pisigivlugu nagliksaaqtitauniġa ilivsi pisigivlusi. Nagliksaaqtitaukama Christ nagliksaaġmatun piuq. Taamna pisigivlugu quviasuktuŋa naarrusiqapkich ilaan nagliksaaġniŋi, pisigivlugich aŋaiyyuliqiruat timigikkani.

english: I became a servant of the church according to the stewardship from God – given to me for you – in order to complete the word of God,
inupiaq: God-im kivgaksraqtaaġiŋagaaŋa aŋaiyyuliqiruanun ilivsi iḷagivlusi, piraksriqł̣uŋa uqautigimmaġiksaaquvlugu ilaan uqaluksrirrutini,

english: that is, the mystery that has been kept hidden from ages and generations, but has now been revealed to his saints.
inupiaq: kaŋiqsiñaiñŋaruaq qaŋapak kiŋuniġiiñi, aglaan paŋmapak kaŋiqsiñaqsiŋagaa ilaan pimiñun, tamatkunuŋa ilaaguaqtauruanun God-mun.

english: God wanted to make known to them the glorious riches of this mystery among the Gentiles, which is Christ in you, the hope of glory.
inupiaq: Iliŋiññun, iḷagivlugich Jew-guŋitchuat, God-im satqummiġuliŋagaa qanutun kamanaqtigivluni kaŋiqsiñaiñŋaruaq. Taamna kaŋiqsiñaiñŋaruaq Christ iñuullaniŋa iḷuvsiññi, aasii niġiullasivḷusi iḷauniksravsiññun iñuuniġmi qiḷaŋmi, ilaa iñuuqatigilugu.

english: We proclaim him by instructing and teaching all people with all wisdom so that we may present every person mature in Christ.
inupiaq: Christ alġaqsruutigigikput, siḷġiqsuqsimavlugu iñupayauraq iḷisautivlugulu isumatutilaaptiktun iñupayauraq atausiŋŋuqatauŋaruaq Christ-mun, agliraksraiqsuatun ukpiqtuagutquvlugu, iñupayauraq qaġġirraukpan sivuġaanun God-im.

english: Toward this goal I also labor, struggling according to his power that powerfully works in me.
inupiaq: Tavra taamna siġġaqutigigiga, aasii piyumiñatualukkiga qanuq Christ sapiġñaqtuam suaŋŋataa savakłuni iḷumni.

english: For I want you to know how great a struggle I have for you, and for those in Laodicea, and for those who have not met me face to face.
inupiaq: Iḷisimatqugivsi qanutupayauraq piŋigitilaavsiññik, taamapkualu Laodicea-miittuat, suli iluqaisa tautuŋaitchuat uvamnik.

english: My goal is that their hearts, having been knit together in love, may be encouraged, and that they may have all the riches that assurance brings in their understanding of the knowledge of the mystery of God, namely, Christ,
inupiaq: Qapiŋaisaaqtautqugitka atautchimuktitauŋammata piviuttaqqutikun avanmun. Tavra nalupqigiŋaipiaġniaġaat kaŋiqsiḷḷuataġlugulu suna God-im salapqiŋakkaŋa sivuniġivlugu Christ kaŋiqsiñaiñŋaruaq qaŋapak.

english: in whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.
inupiaq: Iluqani isumattutiksraq iḷitchuqqutiksraġlu ayuġnaipiaqtuk iluqaptiŋnun atausiŋŋuqatigikaptigu Christ, aasii taapkuak piqpagnapiaqtuk uvaptiŋnun.

english: I say this so that no one will deceive you through arguments that sound reasonable.
inupiaq: Taavrumiŋa uqallautigivsi kimulliqaa asiñuutitquŋił̣ł̣usi saglunik uqautilusi.

english: For though I am absent from you in body, I am present with you in spirit, rejoicing to see your morale and the firmness of your faith in Christ.
inupiaq: Qanuq nayuŋitkaluaŋŋavsi isumamni itqatigiruatun itkivsi, aasii quviasuktuŋa pisigivlugu iñuuniaqatigiigḷuataġniqsi, suli ukpiġurri Christ-mun suaŋapiaġataġman.

english: Therefore, just as you received Christ Jesus as Lord, continue to live your lives in him,
inupiaq: Tavra Christ Jesus Atanġum ukpiġutivsigun annautiŋammasi, iñuusiqaġitchi ataramik ukpiqsimaaġlusi ilaanun.

english: rooted and built up in him and firm in your faith just as you were taught, and overflowing with thankfulness.
inupiaq: Napaaqtuq pamataummatun maŋŋuġmigun aasii nauvluni qunmun, tainnatullisuq ukpiġurri Christ-mun suaŋasisaiññaġli tuniqsimallasiḷusi, quyagiqpaglugich supayaurat ilaan piŋaraŋi. Tainna iḷisausiaqaŋarusi.

english: Be careful not to allow anyone to captivate you through an empty, deceitful philosophy that is according to human traditions and the elemental spirits of the world, and not according to Christ.
inupiaq: Qaunagisitchi. Iḷisausiavsiññiñ asiñuutipkaġnasi iñuŋnun iḷisaurriruanun iñugruiññaich isumattutaatigun, anniqsuutauŋitchut sagluuvlutiŋ. Tainnatchit iñuich iḷisaurrutiqaqtut iñuich isumaŋiññik iñuuniaġluataġnikun, iḷisaurrivḷutiglu ilitqutchiñun aŋalannivḷugich sut God-im savaaŋi, iḷisaurriñiaġnatiŋ Christ iḷisaurrutiŋiñik.

english: For in him all the fullness of deity lives in bodily form,
inupiaq: Qanuq Christ-mi, ilaan timaani, iluqaġmi God iñuuruq.

english: and you have been filled in him, who is the head over every ruler and authority.
inupiaq: Aasii ilivsi atausiŋŋuqatigiŋakavsiuŋ Christ, ilivsivsauq piqaġmiusi iluqaanik God-mik iñuuruamik iḷuvsiññi. Christ kamanaġniqsrauruq aŋalatchiruaq iluqaiññiñ suaŋŋatiniñ naagga ilitqutchiñiñ.

english: In him you also were circumcised – not, however, with a circumcision performed by human hands, but by the removal of the fleshly body, that is, through the circumcision done by Christ.
inupiaq: Aasiisuli atausiŋŋuqataukavsi Christ-mun, nalunaiñŋutchiqsauŋarusi God-mun iñuksraqtaaguvlusi. Nalunaiñŋutchiqsauŋaitchusi timisi piḷaktaulugich Jew-guruatun, aglaan iḷisimanaqtinŋagiksi God-mun nalunaiñŋutchiqsauŋatilaaqsi piḷuusiqiugaaŋaiqł̣usi, suli iñuuvlusi iviġagniaqługu Christ.

english: Having been buried with him in baptism, you also have been raised with him through your faith in the power of God who raised him from the dead.
inupiaq: Qanuq paptaiqsaukavsi piqasiutimmatun piŋarusi tuqqutaanun Christ, piḷuksisuguuruat iñuutchisi iḷuviqatauŋarut ilaanun. Aasii paptaiġutikun aŋipkaqtauqatigimmatun piŋagiksi Christ, qanuq ukpiġiŋagiksi God-im pikkaŋa, aŋipkaqługu Christ tuqqunmiñ.

english: And even though you were dead in your transgressions and in the uncircumcision of your flesh, he nevertheless made you alive with him, having forgiven all your transgressions.
inupiaq: Ilivsi-suli iñuich tuquŋaruatun iñuktun God-mun inŋagaluaqtuasii, qanuq kamagilaił̣ł̣ugich ilaan pitquraŋi, nalunaiñŋutchiqsauŋaił̣ł̣usiḷu ilaanun iñuginiḷusi. Aglaan paŋmapak God-im piqataullasigaasi iñuggunmik isuitchuamik Christ-mun, qanuq suliqutigiŋaiŋagai iluqaisa piḷuutisi, itqatqikkumiñaiqł̣ugich.

english: He has destroyed what was against us, a certificate of indebtedness expressed in decrees opposed to us. He has taken it away by nailing it to the cross.
inupiaq: Christ tuqukami aŋarraurami piiŋagai tatavsausiaksrautikkaluavut nalliummatiruat uvagut kamaksriŋiññiptiŋnun God-im pitquraŋiñik. God-im tigummatun piŋagai piḷuutivut, aasii kikiaktuutivlugich aŋarrauramun, tainnaqłuni piiŋagai.

english: Disarming the rulers and authorities, he has made a public disgrace of them, triumphing over them by the cross.
inupiaq: Aasiisuli, Christ tuqukami akimaŋaruq iluqaiññiñ ilitqusiqł̣uŋniñ atanniqsimanniktuaniñ aŋalatchiruaniḷḷu iñuŋnik. Christ iḷisimanaqsiŋagaa suaŋŋatiqałhaaqtilaani iliŋiññiñ akiiḷivḷugich.

english: Therefore do not let anyone judge you with respect to food or drink, or in the matter of a feast, new moon, or Sabbath days –
inupiaq: Tavra tamatkua tainnainniġmata, uŋiarrisiginagich iñuich pisaaŋakpasi sutigun niġikkavsigun, naagga imikkavsigun, niqinaqiyyaġnivsigun, naagga nalunaiqsimarauruatigun niqinaqiviksigun tatqiḷiġaġimman naagga Savaiñmata.

english: these are only the shadow of the things to come, but the reality is Christ!
inupiaq: Tainnatchich pitqurriutit anniqsuutauŋarut iñuŋnun kisianik Christ qaiñiŋanun aglaan. Taġġałhiñauŋarut pipiaguruamun Christ-mun ilaanun.

english: Let no one who delights in humility and the worship of angels pass judgment on you. That person goes on at great lengths about what he has supposedly seen, but he is puffed up with empty notions by his fleshly mind.
inupiaq: Iñuŋmun uqallautipkaġnasi tammaŋaniḷusi qanuq kamanaiyaŋiññavsi ilivsiññik aŋaiyyuvigilugich isaġulgich. Tainnatchich iñuich iḷisimmatinignisuurut qiñiqtuuraatigun, aasii arguaŋasivḷutiŋ, qanuq annaurrauŋaił̣ł̣utiŋ.

english: He has not held fast to the head from whom the whole body, supported and knit together through its ligaments and sinews, grows with a growth that is from God.
inupiaq: Taapkua iñuich pituummiŋitchut Christ Ataniġmun. Christ niaquuruatun ittuq, aasii aŋaiyyuliqiruaŋi timitun. Iluqaġmiŋ pituummiruat niaqqumun navyaatigun nukiktigullu nauqatigiiguurut, God-im naupkaqługich.

english: If you have died with Christ to the elemental spirits of the world, why do you submit to them as though you lived in the world?
inupiaq: Christ tuqumman, tuqummatun piŋarusi ilitqutchiñun iñuiḷḷu isummatiġruiññaŋiññun annaurraunikun. Paŋmapak tamatkua aŋalanŋaiŋagaasi. Taamnaasii tainnainman, iñuuŋaiqsuksraupiaqtusi aŋalataġipkaġlusi tamatkunuŋa. Annagniataktuksrauŋitchusi kamaksriñikun pitquranik

english: “Do not handle! Do not taste! Do not touch!”
inupiaq: inna ittuanik uqaluŋnik, Aksiugnagu taamna niqi, Uuksiñak taavrumiŋa niqimik, Aksiuqqayaanagu taamna.

english: These are all destined to perish with use, founded as they are on human commands and teachings.
inupiaq: Tainnatchich pitqurat iñugruiññaich iḷisaurrutigigaich, qanuq piqutiqaqtut nuŋusuuruanik.

english: Even though they have the appearance of wisdom with their self-imposed worship and false humility achieved by an unsparing treatment of the body – a wisdom with no true value – they in reality result in fleshly indulgence.
inupiaq: Tamatkua pitqurat qiññaqaġumiñaġaluaqtut nakuuruatun, qanuq aŋaiyyupkallavlugich iñuich, suli kamasaaŋaiḷḷavlugich inmiŋnik pitchaiḷiñiapiallavlugich timitiŋ. Aglaan tainnatchich pitqurat suaŋŋasiġumiñaipiaġaat iñuk akiiḷiyumiñaqsiḷugich pigiitchuakun kipiġniuġutit, savaaġiitchuallu.

english: Therefore, if you have been raised with Christ, keep seeking the things above, where Christ is, seated at the right hand of God.
inupiaq: Christ aŋipkaqtaumman tuqqunmiñ, aŋipkaqtauŋammatun ittusi piqatigivlugu ilaa. Taamna tainnainman, kipiġniuġutigituiññaqsigik quviasaaġusiat quviasuutillu qiḷaŋmiittuat, Christ irviani, aquvititauvluni taliqpiata tuŋaanun God-im.

english: Keep thinking about things above, not things on the earth,
inupiaq: Isumagituiññaqsigik sut tatpaŋmaniittuat. Isumagigiññaŋaiġḷugich sut nunamiittuat.

english: for you have died and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
inupiaq: Qanuq tuquŋaruatun iñuktun ittusi iluqaiññun pigiitchuanun kipiġniuġutinun, iñuggurri iriqsimavluni piqatigivlugu Christ qiḷaŋmiittuaq, God-lu.

english: When Christ (who is your life) appears, then you too will be revealed in glory with him.
inupiaq: Christ iñuggutigikkaqput qiñiġnaqsikpan, ilivsivsauq qiñiġnaqsiqatiginiaġiksi, piqataulusi ilaan kamanautaanun.

english: So put to death whatever in your nature belongs to the earth: sexual immorality, impurity, shameful passion, evil desire, and greed which is idolatry.
inupiaq: Tavra tamatkua tainnainmata, iñuusitchi tuqunmatun piḷugich iluqaisa pigiitchuat iḷuvsiññi. Isummatigisitchi ilivsiññik tuquruatun naluksriḷḷugich qanusipayaat allatuutit, salumaitchuat isummatit, qanusipayaat pigiitchuat kipiġniuġutit, kaviuqqutillu. Kaviuqqutiqałhaaġniq sunun iñuŋnullu God-mun piviuttaqqunmiñ iñuuraqpaqaġniġuruq.

english: Because of these things the wrath of God is coming on the sons of disobedience.
inupiaq: Pisigilugu iñuich tainnatchiñik piḷuusiqiniŋat tatavsaġniaġai God-im.

english: You also lived your lives in this way at one time, when you used to live among them.
inupiaq: Qaŋauvlugu iñuuŋŋavsi tamatkunatun iñuktun, tamatkua pisuuŋagaluaġmigisi.

english: But now, put off all such things as anger, rage, malice, slander, abusive language from your mouth.
inupiaq: Aglaan paŋmapak, aġiusigik tamatkua piḷuutit, sunŋusuutit, qinnautit uqautikłiġñiġich pigiitchuanik, saglutillu iñuktigun, salumaitchuaniglu uqaluqaġniġich.

english: Do not lie to one another since you have put off the old man with its practices
inupiaq: Sagluuŋaiġḷusi avanmun, qanuq paŋmapak aŋalataġiŋaiġaasi piḷuktuat isumavsi piḷġusivsiḷu. Tainna iñuusiqaŋaiŋarusi,

english: and have been clothed with the new man that is being renewed in knowledge according to the image of the one who created it.
inupiaq: aasii iñuusarraqsivḷusi nutauruakun iñuutchimik, iḷitchisaiññaqłusi nalaunŋaruakun iñuutchimik, Christ-tun iḷisaiññaġuktuamik.

english: Here there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcised or uncircumcised, barbarian, Scythian, slave or free, but Christ is all and in all.
inupiaq: Iñuusiġiliutikaptigu taamna nutauruaq iñuusiq, sumiugitchuq akunġanni iñuich, Greek-gugaluaġmata Jew-gugaluaġmatalu, nalunaiñŋutchiŋavlutiglu timimiŋni God-mun naagga nalunaiñŋutchiŋaitkaluaġmata, aglagnik nalugaluaġmata, naagga aŋuyyiqigaluaġmata Scythians-tun, naagga kivgaugaluaġmata kivgauŋitkaluaġmatalu, qanuq Christ naumałhaaqtuq iluqaiññiñ iñuuvluni iluqaiññi ilaan iñuŋmiñi.

english: Therefore, as the elect of God, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with a heart of mercy, kindness, humility, gentleness, and patience,
inupiaq: Tavra God-im iñuksraqtaaġiŋammasi, piḷuutaiqł̣usi piviuttaġivlusiḷu, kiikaa iḷunŋusuutiqaġitchi allanun, ikayuiruagulusi, kamasaaŋaiġḷusi, paaqłaktautaiḷḷusi qimmaksaliyaiḷḷusiḷu,

english: bearing with one another and forgiving one another, if someone happens to have a complaint against anyone else. Just as the Lord has forgiven you, so you also forgive others.
inupiaq: piaqłuktautiŋaiġḷusi avanmun. Iñuk uqaallatiksraqaġaluaġumi allamun iñuŋmun, suliqutigiŋaiġḷiuŋ itqaumaŋaiġḷugu uqaallatiksraq. Atanġuptauq suliqutigiŋaiŋammagich piḷuutivut itqaumayumiñaiqł̣ugich, tainnatulli uvagut suliqutigiŋaigaksraġigivut allat pimaqłuutiŋich uvaptiŋnun.

english: And to all these virtues add love, which is the perfect bond.
inupiaq: Naumałhaaqtuaq iluqaiññiñ, piviuttaqqutituiññaġitchi avanmun. Piviuttaqqutim atausiŋŋuumapkapiallakkai iñupayaat.

english: Let the peace of Christ be in control in your heart (for you were in fact called as one body to this peace), and be thankful.
inupiaq: Aasii aŋuyautairrutim Christ pipkakkaŋata ataramik aŋalallisi, qanuq God-im ququaŋagaasi iḷautquvlusi ativlutiŋ aŋaiyyuliqiruanun, suli iñuuqatigiiquvlusi aŋuyautaiḷḷusi. Suli quyyatiqaġitchi ataramik.

english: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly, teaching and exhorting one another with all wisdom, singing psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs, all with grace in your hearts to God.
inupiaq: Ataramik isummatigisigik iluqaisa Christ iḷisaurrutiŋi iñuusiġilugiḷḷu. Tavraasii tainna piguvsi isumattutinigniaqtusi aasii iḷisaurriyumiñaqsiḷusi siḷġiqsuutiyumiñaqsiḷusiḷu avanmun, atuutiqaġumiñaqsiḷusiḷu Psalms-nik nanġautiniglu suli atuutinik qapiŋaisaaġutauruanik ukpiqtuanun, quyyatiqaġlusi uummativsiññiñ God-mun.

english: And whatever you do in word or deed, do it all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through him.
inupiaq: Suli sunapayaaq piguvsiuŋ naagga uqallausiġiguvsiuŋ, pisiuŋ Atanġum Jesus pisiksraŋatun uqallausiksraŋatullu, quyyavigilugu Aapa ilaagun.

english: Wives, submit to your husbands, as is fitting in the Lord.
inupiaq: Nuliaguruasii, kamakkutiqaġitchi uivsiññun. Taamna nalaunŋaruq ukpiqtuaguruanun Ataniġmun.

english: Husbands, love your wives and do not be embittered against them.
inupiaq: Uiguruasii piviuttaġisigik tuvaaqatisi, suammatisuŋaiññaŋaiġḷugich.

english: Children, obey your parents in everything, for this is pleasing in the Lord.
inupiaq: Miqłiqtuut, kamagisigik aŋayuqaasi ataramik, qanuq kamaksriñivsi Ataniq iviġaksimaaġaa.

english: Fathers, do not provoke your children, so they will not become disheartened.
inupiaq: Aapauruasii, suasuŋaiññaġnagich miqłiqtusi, qapiŋasiviaqtut kamaksriñiaġniġmiŋni ilivsiññik.

english: Slaves, obey your earthly masters in every respect, not only when they are watching – like those who are strictly people-pleasers – but with a sincere heart, fearing the Lord.
inupiaq: Kivgaat, kamaksrisitchi ataramik tamatkuniŋa ilivsi ataniġikkavsiññik, qiñiqtiqaġuvsi kisianik pisuŋaġnasi, iñuŋnik iviġaiñiaqtitun, aglaan ataramik savaglusi iviġaumasuglugu Ataniq.

english: Whatever you are doing, work at it with enthusiasm, as to the Lord and not for people,
inupiaq: Sunapayaaq savaaġiguvsiuŋ, savagitchi piyummatiqaġlusi, savautimmatun Ataniq iñuŋił̣aat,

english: because you know that you will receive your inheritance from the Lord as the reward. Serve the Lord Christ.
inupiaq: iḷisimaugaġlusi Atanġum akiḷiġñiaġaasi kiŋuvaannaktaamik, qanuq savautigiksi Ataniq Christ.

english: For the one who does wrong will be repaid for his wrong, and there are no exceptions.
inupiaq: Iñuk killuliqirauruaq akiḷiqsauniaqtuq killuliqiamigun. Iñupayaat atilugich piñiaġaich.

english: From Paul and Silvanus and Timothy, to the church of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ. Grace and peace to you!
inupiaq: Paul-lu Silvanus-lu Timothy-lu tuyuqtut ukuniŋa tuyuutinik aŋaiyyuliqiruanun iniqpaŋmi atiqaqtuami Thessalonica-mik, atausiŋŋuqatauŋaruanun God-mun Aapamun, Ataniġmullu Jesus Christ-mun. Nagliktuusiaqpaqaġitchisuq tutqiunmiglu.

english: We thank God always for all of you as we mention you constantly in our prayers,
inupiaq: Quyyavigisuugikput God ataramik, quyyatigivlusi iluqasi, ataramik itqaumavlusi aŋaiyyutiptiŋni.

english: because we recall in the presence of our God and Father your work of faith and labor of love and endurance of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ.
inupiaq: Quyyavigigiga God Aapavut pisigivlugich savaasi qanuq ukpiqtuaguvlusi, suli siġġaqutisi qanuq piviuttaqsrivḷusi, igḷutuutilguniqsiḷu qanuq niġiugiugaqługu qaitqigñiksraŋa Atanipta Jesus Christ.

english: We know, brothers and sisters loved by God, that he has chosen you,
inupiaq: Aniqatiit, God-im piviuttaġiraŋasi, iḷisimarugut God-mun piksraqtaaġiŋatilaavsiññik,

english: in that our gospel did not come to you merely in words, but in power and in the Holy Spirit and with deep conviction (surely you recall the character we displayed when we came among you to help you).
inupiaq: qanuq alġaqsruutigikaptigu tusaayugaaġiksuaq ilivsiññun, uqalułhiñakun piŋaitchuq, aglaallu Ilitqusiġiksuam suaŋŋataagun, nalupqinaiqsruutipiaġatakullu. Iḷisimammiusi qanuq iñuuŋatilaaptiŋnik akunnavsiññi ilivsi pisigivlusi.

english: And you became imitators of us and of the Lord, when you received the message with joy that comes from the Holy Spirit, despite great affliction.
inupiaq: Aasii ilivsi piñiarraqsiŋarusiḷi uvaptiktun Ataniqtullu, akuqtuqługu tusaayugaaġiksuaq, quviasuutiqaqłusi Ilitqusiġiksuamiñ, qanutupayauraq nagliksaaqtitaugaluaŋŋavsi.

english: As a result you became an example to all the believers in Macedonia and in Achaia.
inupiaq: Tainna pikavsi, ilivsi tuvraaksriiŋarusi iluqaiññun ukpiqtuaguruanun Macedonia-mi Greece-miḷu.

english: For from you the message of the Lord has echoed forth not just in Macedonia and Achaia, but in every place reports of your faith in God have spread, so that we do not need to say anything.
inupiaq: Qanuq ilivsi siaminŋagiksi tusaayugaaġiksuaq iluqaiññun nunaŋiñun Macedonia-vlu Greece-lu. Aasiisuli tusaayugaaq ukpiġutiqaġnivsigun God-mun siaminŋammiuq sumulliqaa, uvaptiŋnun-unnii quliaqtuaġiraksraiqł̣ugu.

english: For people everywhere report how you welcomed us and how you turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God
inupiaq: Suli quliaqtuaġutigaatigut qanutun niġummaaŋmatun unnii paġlativsi itilaaŋanik uvaptiŋnun, suli quliaqtuaġivlugu mumiŋatilaaqsi savaurriñivsiññiñ iñuuraqpaŋnik savautisukługu iñuuruaq iḷumullu ittuaq God.

english: and to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, Jesus our deliverer from the coming wrath.
inupiaq: Quliaqtuaġimmigaat niġiugniqsi God-im Iġñiŋanik qiḷaŋmiñ, Jesus-mik, ilaan aŋipkaŋaraanik tuqqunmiñ, annaurriruaq uvaptiŋnik God-im tatavsautiksrautaaniñ.

english: For you yourselves know, brothers and sisters, about our coming to you – it has not proven to be purposeless.
inupiaq: Qanuq ilivsiññi iḷisimarusi, aniqatiit, ullautiniqput ilivsiññun asiḷiqqutauŋaitchuq.

english: But although we suffered earlier and were mistreated in Philippi, as you know, we had the courage in our God to declare to you the gospel of God in spite of much opposition.
inupiaq: Iḷisimarusi qanutun nagliksaaganiktilaaptiŋnik suli kanŋunaqtuakun aŋalatauŋatilaaptiŋnik Philippi-mi. Naaggasuliuvva God-ipta qapiŋaisaaġaatigut alġaqsruitquvluta ilivsiññun ilaan tusaayugaaġiksuamiñik kasuigaluaqtilluta akiḷḷiḷiqsuutiqpaŋnik.

english: For the appeal we make does not come from error or impurity or with deceit,
inupiaq: Ukpiliquuqavsi sagluuqtuaġluta piŋaitchugut, naagga allatuqtauluta, naagga nipuqsaiḷuta ilivsiññik,

english: but just as we have been approved by God to be entrusted with the gospel, so we declare it, not to please people but God, who examines our hearts.
inupiaq: aglaan ukpiliquuŋagivsi uvagut God-im iviġaumagivluta, piksraqtaaġiŋammatigullu alġaqsruutigitquvlugu tusaayugaaġiksuaq. Alġaqsruiŋitchugut iviġagniugaqsiññaġlugich iñuich, aglaan iviġagniaqługu God, naipiqtuqtuaq iluqaiññik kipiġniuġutiptiŋnik sivunniuġutiptiŋniglu.

english: For we never appeared with flattering speech, as you know, nor with a pretext for greed – God is our witness –
inupiaq: Qanuq iḷisimarusi uvagut qaŋaunnii alġaqsruiŋaitchugut iḷamarrutiginiaġlugu, naaggaunnii piŋŋuaġutigilugu kaviuġilugich suġauttasi. God-im taamna iḷisimagaa.

english: nor to seek glory from people, either from you or from others,
inupiaq: Suli alġaqsruiŋitchugut iñuŋnun nanġaquluta, ilivsiññun-unnii naagga allanun. Nalaunŋagaluaġmiuq nanġaquupiaġupta ilivsiññun, uvagut Christ tiliraġivluta.

english: although we could have imposed our weight as apostles of Christ; instead we became little children among you. Like a nursing mother caring for her own children,
inupiaq: Aglaan uvagut piaqłuktaŋaitchugut akunnavsiññi, piḷaaqtitun qaunaksriruatun miqłiqtumiñik.

english: with such affection for you we were happy to share with you not only the gospel of God but also our own lives, because you had become dear to us.
inupiaq: Uvagut piviuttaġiliqpaŋagivsi, piqpaŋnaqsivaił̣ł̣usi uvaptiŋnun piqatigiyumaliŋagivsiunnii iñuggutiptiŋni, piqatigiyumammatuttauq God-im tusaayugaaġiksuaŋanik.

english: For you recall, brothers and sisters, our toil and drudgery: By working night and day so as not to impose a burden on any of you, we preached to you the gospel of God.
inupiaq: Nalupqinaitchuq itqaumatilaaqsi qanutun savaŋatilaaptiŋnik siġġaqiŋatilaaptiŋniglu, aniqatiit, alġaqsruutigikaptigu ilivsiññun tusaayugaaġiksuaŋa God-im savaŋarugut unnuamiḷu uvlumiḷu naŋniġuŋitkaluaqługu nallipayaaqsi pamaġipkaġluta.

english: You are witnesses, and so is God, as to how holy and righteous and blameless our conduct was toward you who believe.
inupiaq: Iḷisimarusi, God-ttauq iḷisimammiuq, uvagut iññiqusiqput ilivsiññik ukpiqtuanik piḷuutaiñŋaruq, suli nalaunŋavluni, pasiñaġumiñaił̣ł̣uniḷu.

english: As you know, we treated each one of you as a father treats his own children,
inupiaq: Qanuq iḷisimarusi aŋalanŋagivsi aapauruaq miqłiqtumiñik aŋalatchiruatun iḷivḷuta. Uvagut siḷġiqsuŋammigivsi qapiŋaisaaqłusiḷu pitquripiaqłuta ilivsiññik atausiullaavlusi,

english: exhorting and encouraging you and insisting that you live in a way worthy of God who calls you to his own kingdom and his glory.
inupiaq: iñuutquvlusi nalliummatilusi God-im iñuusiġitqukkaŋanun, ququaŋammasi piqatautquvlusi ataniġnaqunmiñi kamanaunmiñiḷu.

english: And so we too constantly thank God that when you received God’s message that you heard from us, you accepted it not as a human message, but as it truly is, God’s message, which is at work among you who believe.
inupiaq: Aasiisuli quyyavigimmigikput God ataramik uumuuna, ilivsi akuqtuqavsiuŋ uqalua God-im tusaaŋakkaqsi uvaptiŋniñ, akuqtuŋaitkiksi uqalugipkaqtaġlugu iñuŋnun aglaan irrusipiaġataŋatun, uqalua God-im, savaktuaq ilivsiññi ukpiqtuani.

english: For you became imitators, brothers and sisters, of God’s churches in Christ Jesus that are in Judea, because you too suffered the same things from your own countrymen as they in fact did from the Jews,
inupiaq: Qanuq tuvrautirraqsiŋarusi aŋaiyyuliqiruaŋiñun God-im Judea-miittuanun, atausiŋŋuqatauŋaruanun Christ-mun. Iliŋisituttauq nagliksaaqtinŋakkaŋisitun nunatqatiŋisa, ilivsivsauq nagliksaaqtinmigaasi nunatqativsi.

english: who killed both the Lord Jesus and the prophets and persecuted us severely. They are displeasing to God and are opposed to all people,
inupiaq: Jew-guruat tuqunŋagaat Ataniq Jesus, uqaqtauruallu God-mun, aasiisuli uvagut aniłłuta. Tamatkua Jew-guruat akiḷḷiḷiqsuġaich God-lu iñuiḷḷu,

english: because they hinder us from speaking to the Gentiles so that they may be saved. Thus they constantly fill up their measure of sins, but wrath has come upon them completely.
inupiaq: alġaqsruitchaiḷiraqłuta Jew-guŋitchuanun annaurrautquŋitkaluaqługich. Tainna pikamiŋ Jew-guruat piḷuksirut piḷuksiḷgutilaamiktun maŋŋuumiktun. Kiisaimmaa God-im tatavsarraqsivai.

english: But when we were separated from you, brothers and sisters, for a short time (in presence, not in affection) we became all the more fervent in our great desire to see you in person.
inupiaq: Aniqatiit, aullaqapta ilivsiññiñ piisaaqtuallaanikapta piigulaił̣ł̣usi sumikunnii tautuvsaaġupiaŋagivsi, tavraasii utiġniapiaŋagaluaqtugut ilivsiññun.

english: For we wanted to come to you (I, Paul, in fact tried again and again) but Satan thwarted us.
inupiaq: Uvaŋa Paul ullagupiaġaluaġivsi. Qaiñiatatqigaaġaluaqtuŋa, Satan piñaiḷutchiqsuġaaŋa.

english: For who is our hope or joy or crown to boast of before our Lord Jesus at his coming? Is it not of course you?
inupiaq: Uvvami sum niġiuktitpatigut quviasukkumaaqtiłłutalu kanŋusuksaġumaaŋił̣ł̣utalu sivuġaani Atanipta Jesus ilaa qaikpan? Ilivsi.

english: For you are our glory and joy!
inupiaq: Ilivsi ukpiqtuaguruat kamasaaġutiginiaġivsi quviasuutigilusiḷu.

english: So when we could bear it no longer, we decided to stay on in Athens alone.
inupiaq: Tavra igḷutulguiḷikapku uŋiarriñ qanuqtilaavsiññik qimaktauyumalliŋaruŋa Athens-mun kisiŋŋuġluŋa,

english: We sent Timothy, our brother and fellow worker for God in the gospel of Christ, to strengthen you and encourage you about your faith,
inupiaq: aasii tiliŋagikput Timothy, aniqatikput, God-im kivgaŋa alġaqsruiñiġmun tusaayugaaġiksuaŋanik Christ, suaŋasiḷaaquvlusi ukpiġutivsiññi qapiŋaisaaġlusiḷu,

english: so that no one would be shaken by these afflictions. For you yourselves know that we are destined for this.
inupiaq: iñuŋmun kimulliqaa nipuqsaquŋił̣ł̣usi ukpiġniksravsiññiñ tamatkua nagliksaaqtirrusiat piŋŋaisa. Ilivsi ilivsiññi iḷisimarusi piksraqtaaguŋatilaavsiññik nalautaksraġivlugu nagliksaaqtitauniq.

english: For in fact when we were with you, we were telling you in advance that we would suffer affliction, and so it has happened, as you well know.
inupiaq: Qanuq nayuutiŋŋapta ilivsiññun, uqautiŋagivsi sivuani nagliksaaqtitauniaġnivḷuta. Taamna nalaurraqsiŋaruq iḷisimammiusi.

english: So when I could bear it no longer, I sent to find out about your faith, for fear that the tempter somehow tempted you and our toil had proven useless.
inupiaq: Tavra igḷutulguiḷigaluaqapku uŋiarrisiga ilivsigun, tiliŋagiga Timothy iḷitchuġiyaqtuquvlugu ukpiġutivsiññi qapiŋaitkaluaġmagaavsisuli, piŋiksraqłuŋa iḷaanni qanutchikun Tuunġaġmun killuqsaqtinniaġasugalusi, aasii uvagut siġġaqutikput alġaqsruikapta ilivsiññun anniqsuutauŋaiġñiaġasugalugu.

english: But now Timothy has come to us from you and given us the good news of your faith and love and that you always think of us with affection and long to see us just as we also long to see you!
inupiaq: Paŋmapak-aasii Timothy utiŋaruq ilivsiññiñ, aasii quliaqtuaġutivluta tusaayugaalluatanik ilivsi ukpiġutivsigun piviuttaqqutivsigullu. Quliaqtuaġutimmigaatigut ilivsiññun ataramik itqaumalluataġuunivḷuta, suli tautugumasuunivḷuta, uvaptiŋnuttauq tautuguliġmipkaqtillusi.

english: So in all our distress and affliction, we were reassured about you, brothers and sisters, through your faith.
inupiaq: Tamatkua iluqaġmiŋ tusaayugaalluatat ilivsigun ukpiġutiqaqtuiññaġnivsigullu qapiŋaiqsaaŋagaanŋa, qanutupayauraq iłuiḷḷiuqtitaugaluaqtilluŋa nagliksaaqtitauvluŋalu.

english: For now we are alive again, if you stand firm in the Lord.
inupiaq: Igḷutuġumiñaqsigiga sunapayauraq iḷitchuġianikama ukpiġutiqaqtilaavsiññik suli suaŋaruamik Ataniġmi.

english: For how can we thank God enough for you, for all the joy we feel because of you before our God?
inupiaq: Quviatchapiaġataġivsiŋa sivuġaani God-ima. Qanutun quyyavigiyumiñaqtigigiga God naamasiḷugu quyyatigilusi.

english: We pray earnestly night and day to see you in person and make up what may be lacking in your faith.
inupiaq: Unnuakkaluami uvlukkaluamiḷu aŋaiyyuupiaġuuruŋa tautuvsaaġukłusi, aasii iḷisautilusi sunik iḷitchuġiŋaisavsiññik ukpiġutiqaġnikullu Christ-mi.

english: Now may God our Father himself and our Lord Jesus direct our way to you.
inupiaq: Paŋmapaktuq God-ipta Aapam ilaan, Ataniptalu Jesus, sivunniġḷiuŋ iglauyaaksraqput ilivsiññun,

english: And may the Lord cause you to increase and abound in love for one another and for all, just as we do for you,
inupiaq: aasiisuli, Atanġuptuq aglipkavsaasuġrugliuŋ piviuttaqqutiniqsi avanmun, allanullu iñupayaanun, uvaguttauq piviuttaqqutiqaqtilaaptiktun ilivsiññun.

english: so that your hearts are strengthened in holiness to be blameless before our God and Father at the coming of our Lord Jesus with all his saints.
inupiaq: Tainna piguvsi, tuniqsimaniaqtusi ukpiġutivsiññi pasirauniaŋiḷḷusi, suli piḷuutaiḷḷusi, akuqtuġnaġumiñaġniaqtusi God-mun Aapaptiŋnun Ataniqput Jesus qaikpan piqatigilugich iluqaisa ilaan ilaaguaqtauŋaruat iñuŋni.

english: Finally then, brothers and sisters, we ask you and urge you in the Lord Jesus, that as you received instruction from us about how you must live and please God (as you are in fact living) that you do so more and more.
inupiaq: Aasiisuli aniqatiit, kiiqsruġivsi siḷġiqsuqłusiḷu atausiŋŋuqatigianiŋakavsiuŋ Ataniq Jesus, iñuutquvlusi tuvraġlugu iḷisaurrutikput ilivsiññun, iviġaumagikkaŋa God-im. Tainna iñuusaaniŋagaluaġmiusi, aglaan uvaŋa sivunmuktuġlusisuli iñuutqugivsi.

english: For you know what commands we gave you through the Lord Jesus.
inupiaq: Qanuq iḷisimagisi sut iḷisaurrutigiŋaravut ilivsiññun ataniġnaqutaagun Atanġum Jesus.

english: For this is God’s will: that you become holy, that you keep away from sexual immorality,
inupiaq: God-im iñuutqugaasi iñuusiqaġlusi ilaaguaqtauŋaruanik inmiñun, iḷaksiaŋaiġḷugu allatuun,

english: that each of you know how to possess his own body in holiness and honor,
inupiaq: ilivsi atausiullaalusi iḷisimatquvlusi qanuq qaunaginaqtilaamik inmun, piḷuutaiññiaqłuni, suli nalliummatiluni God-mun pigiyumiñaqsiḷuni.

english: not in lustful passion like the Gentiles who do not know God.
inupiaq: Aŋalatinnasi kipiġniuġutivsiññun allatuġumiñaqsiḷusi, ukpiŋaitchuatitun iñuktun naluruatun God-mik.

english: In this matter no one should violate the rights of his brother or take advantage of him, because the Lord is the avenger in all these cases, as we also told you earlier and warned you solemnly.
inupiaq: Tavra kiñaliqaa kamaksriŋiññami aasii saglutaġlugu aniqatini allatuaġilugu tuvaaqataa, qanuq Atanġum tatavsaġniaġai iluqaisa tainna piruat, kiliktuammaġiksaaŋagivsiusi taavruma sivuani.

english: For God did not call us to impurity but in holiness.
inupiaq: Qanuq uvva God-im sivunniutigiŋaitkaa uvagut iñuutquluta piḷuunmi, aglaan iñuuniaquvluta piḷuutaiḷḷuta.

english: Consequently the one who rejects this is not rejecting human authority but God, who gives his Holy Spirit to you.
inupiaq: Taamna pisigilugu, kiñaliqaa iñuusuŋitchuaq kamagilugich taapkua pitqurat, kipuqłaiŋitchuq iñuŋmik aglaan God-mik, aitchuiruamik Ilitqusiġiksuamiñik ilivsiññun.

english: Now on the topic of brotherly love you have no need for anyone to write you, for you yourselves are taught by God to love one another.
