inupiaq: Sivuniġilugu piviuttaqqutaat aniqatit, tuyuqtituŋitchusi kimigliqaa qanuq ilivsi ilivsiññi iḷisaurrusiaqaŋarusi God-miñ piviuttaqqutitquvlusi avanmun,

english: And indeed you are practicing it toward all the brothers and sisters in all of Macedonia. But we urge you, brothers and sisters, to do so more and more,
inupiaq: aasiami iḷumutun piviuttaġigisi iluqaisa aniqatit iluqaani Macedonia-miittuat. Aglaan aniqatiit, uvagut siḷġiqsuġivsi kiikaasuli piviuttaqqutitquvlusi.

english: to aspire to lead a quiet life, to attend to your own business, and to work with your hands, as we commanded you.
inupiaq: Kipiġniuttaġiqpaksiuŋ iñuusuglusi piallataiḷḷusi, suli iḷaksiaŋaiġḷugich allat iñuich, akiññagniḷuglusi iñuuniḷuutiksravsiññik, tuvraġlugu piraksriutikput ilivsiññun.

english: In this way you will live a decent life before outsiders and not be in need.
inupiaq: Taamna piguvsiuŋ, ukpiŋaitchuat isummatigilluataġniaġaasi, suli ilivsi nayummatiqaġniaŋitchusi pamatillusi allanun iñuŋnun.

english: Now we do not want you to be uninformed, brothers and sisters, about those who are asleep, so that you will not grieve like the rest who have no hope.
inupiaq: Aniqatiit, paŋmapak aglaksaqtuŋa sivuniġivlugich siñiktuat tuqqunmi. Iḷisimalluataqugiga taamna ilivsiññun, isumaaqpaquŋił̣ł̣usi allatun iñuktitun niġiugaitchuatun iñuggunmik isuitchuamik.

english: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, so also we believe that God will bring with him those who have fallen asleep as Christians.
inupiaq: Ukpiġikaptigu Jesus tuquŋanivḷugu aasii aŋimmivḷuni, tainnatuttauq ukpiġiyumiñaġmigikput Jesus qaitqikpan, God-mun qaiqatigipkaġniaġniḷugich ilaanun tamatkua siñiksaŋaruat tuqqunmi.

english: For we tell you this by the word of the Lord, that we who are alive, who are left until the coming of the Lord, will surely not go ahead of those who have fallen asleep.
inupiaq: Uqallautigivsi iiguliktauŋitchuamik Atanġum uqallautaanik uvamnun, uvagurguuq iñuuruaguut iñuuniġupta Atanġum qaitqigñiŋanunaglaan, sivulikkumiñaitkivut tamatkua siñiktuat tuqqunmi.

english: For the Lord himself will come down from heaven with a shout of command, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trumpet of God, and the dead in Christ will rise first.
inupiaq: Qanuq Ataniq ilaa atqaġniaqtuq qiḷaŋmiñ ququullatigilugu kamanaqtuaq piraksriun, qaukłiata isaġulgich ququullataanik, suli nipaanik God-im nipauqłuktautaata. Aasii tuquŋaruat, atausiŋŋuqatigiŋavlugu Christ, aŋiqqaaġniaqtut.

english: Then we who are alive, who are left, will be suddenly caught up together with them in the clouds to meet the Lord in the air. And so we will always be with the Lord.
inupiaq: Aasiiḷi uvagut iñuuruaguut mayuurrauniaqtugut piqatigilugich nuvuyanun, paaġlugu Ataniq siḷami, aasii nayuaqsiḷugu ilaa isuitchuamun.

english: Therefore encourage one another with these words.
inupiaq: Quviasaaġutisitchi avanmun taapkuniŋa uqaluŋnik.

english: From Paul and Silvanus and Timothy, to the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
inupiaq: Paul-lu Silvanus-lu Timothy-lu tuyuqtut ukuniŋa tuyuutinik aŋaiyyuliqiruanun iniqpaŋmi atiqaqtuami Thessalonica-mik, tamatkunuŋa atausiŋŋuqatauŋaruanun God-mun Aapaptiŋnun, Ataniġmullu Jesus Christ-mun.

english: Grace and peace to you from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
inupiaq: Nagliktuusiaqpaqaġitchisuq tutqiunmiglu God-miñ Aapamiñ Ataniġmiḷḷu Jesus Christ-miñ.

english: We ought to thank God always for you, brothers and sisters, and rightly so, because your faith flourishes more and more and the love of each one of you all for one another is ever greater.
inupiaq: Aniqatiit, nalaunŋaruq uvagut quyyavigiguptigu God quyyatigilusi. Ami quyyavigituiññagaksraġipiaġikput quyyatigilugu ukpiġurri nausaiññaqtuaq, suli atausiullaavlusi piviuttaqqurriḷu nausaiññaqtuaq ukpiqtuaguqativsiññun.

english: As a result we ourselves boast about you in the churches of God for your perseverance and faith in all the persecutions and afflictions you are enduring.
inupiaq: Aasiuvva uvagut quliaqtuaġilluataġivsi aŋaiyyuliqiruanun God-mun, quliaqtuaġutivlugich qiñuirrutivsiññik ukpiġutivsiññiglu, igḷutuġluataqavsigik qanusipayaat nagliksaaqtirrusiat iłuiḷḷiuġutillu.

english: This is evidence of God’s righteous judgment, to make you worthy of the kingdom of God, for which in fact you are suffering.
inupiaq: Tamatkua nalupqinaiyautaurut God-im nalaunŋaruakun isivġiutaanun, qanuq uvva ilaan nagliksaaqtitaupkaġaasi nalliummatiliquvlusi piqatauniksravsiññun ilaan atanniqsimmataani.

english: For it is right for God to repay with affliction those who afflict you,
inupiaq: Tavra God isivġiiḷḷavluni nalaunŋaruakun, ilaan paaqłiġñiaġai iłuiḷḷiuġunmik tamatkua iłuiḷḷiuqtitchiruat ilivsiññik,

english: and to you who are being afflicted to give rest together with us when the Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven with his mighty angels.
inupiaq: aasiiḷi ilivsi iłuiḷḷiuqtitauruasii unaŋuiqsiqatigipkaġlusi uvaptiŋnun. Taamna piyumaaqtuq Ataniq Jesus tavraŋŋatchiaq niptaqpan qiḷaŋmiñ, piqatigilugich sapiġñaqtuat isaġulgich, qaumaniġmi ikualaruatun igniqtun,

english: With flaming fire he will mete out punishment on those who do not know God and do not obey the gospel of our Lord Jesus.
inupiaq: nalaunŋaruakun akisaġvigisuglugich tamatkua naluruat God-mik, tamatkualu akuqtuiŋaitchuat tusaayugaaġiksuamik Ataniptigun Jesus-kun.

english: They will undergo the penalty of eternal destruction, away from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of his strength,
inupiaq: Tainnatchich iñuich tatavsaqtauniaqtut isuitchuamik tammaunmik, piiqsauŋalutiŋ Atanġum irvianiñ, qaummaġikpaktuamiḷḷu suaŋŋataaniñ,

english: when he comes to be glorified among his saints and admired on that day among all who have believed – and you did in fact believe our testimony.
inupiaq: taavrumani uvlumi qaigumi nanġausiaqaġiaġluni kamanaqsipkaqtauyyaġluniḷu ilaaguaqtauruaniñ iñuŋmiñiñ, kamasuuttaġipkaġiaġluniḷu iluqaiññun ukpiliŋaruanun, ilivsi iḷagilusi, qanuq ukpiġiŋagiksi alġaqsruutikput.

english: And in this regard we pray for you always, that our God will make you worthy of his calling and fulfill by his power your every desire for goodness and every work of faith,
inupiaq: Ataramik aŋaiyyutisuugivsi, aŋaiyyuvigivlugu God-ikput ilaanun nalliummatiliqsitquvlusi miqłiqtuġiyumiñaqsiḷusi, ilaan suaŋŋataagullu taŋŋiqsitaquvlugich savaalluatapayaurat piyumakkasi pianikkasiḷu ukpiġurri pisigivlugu.

english: that the name of our Lord Jesus may be glorified in you, and you in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.
inupiaq: Tainnauvva piguvsi Ataniqput Jesus nanġausiaqaqtinniaġiksi, aasiivsauq ilaata ilivsi nanġaġlusi. Taamnauvva nagliktauvlutik sivunniuġutigiŋagaak God-ipta Atanġuvlu Jesus Christ.

english: Now regarding the arrival of our Lord Jesus Christ and our being gathered to be with him, we ask you, brothers and sisters,
inupiaq: Paŋmapak tuyuġivsi aglaŋnik sivuniġivlugu qaiñiksraŋa Atanipta Jesus Christ, uvagullu katinniksraptigun paaqsaġlugu ilaa.

english: not to be easily shaken from your composure or disturbed by any kind of spirit or message or letter allegedly from us, to the effect that the day of the Lord is already here.
inupiaq: Aniqatiit, nalupqitchaquŋipiaġivsi naagga iłuiḷḷiuġutiginagu isummiġḷusi Atanġum isivġiiviksrautaa isagutisaaniŋniḷugu. Taamna tuniqsimaŋaiġutiginagu kiñaliqaa uqaġaluaqpan uqaluksriusiaqaġniḷuni Ilitqusiġiksuamiñ, naagga uvaptiŋniñ uqaluksriusiaqaġniḷuni, naagga tuyuutitigun aglaaġipkaqtitaġlugich uvaptiŋnun, Atanġum isivġiiviksrautaa isagutianiŋniḷugu.

english: Let no one deceive you in any way. For that day will not arrive until the rebellion comes and the man of lawlessness is revealed, the son of destruction.
inupiaq: Kimulliqaa qanupayaaq sagluqipkaġnasi. Sivuani isivġiġviksrautim kamanapiaqtuaq paaqsaaŋŋan God-mun iḷiñiaqtuq, aasii taavrumaŋŋa iñukpalliġḷuni iñuk piḷupiaġataqtuaq, iñuk nalupqinaitchuamik isuitchuamun suksraunġiqsauniaqtuaq.

english: He opposes and exalts himself above every so-called god or object of worship, and as a result he takes his seat in God’s temple, displaying himself as God.
inupiaq: Taamna iñuk akiḷḷiḷiqsuiñiaqtuq qanusipayauramik god-mik, naagga supayaamik iñuich aŋaiyyuvigikkaŋannik, inmiñun kamanałhaaqtualiuġluni tamatkunaŋŋa. Inmiñik unnii kamanałhaaqtualiñiaqtuq God-miñ, aquppiḷuniḷu God-im aŋaiyyuvikpaŋani, uqavigaaġutigiluni inmiñik God-auniḷuni.

english: Surely you recall that I used to tell you these things while I was still with you.
inupiaq: Nalupqigiŋitkiga itqaumatilaaqsi taavrumuuna uqautimnik ilivsiññun nayuŋŋavsi.

english: And so you know what holds him back, so that he will be revealed in his own time.
inupiaq: Aasii itqaġumiñaqtusi sumun pitchaiḷiraqtilaaŋanik paŋmapak salapqiġñiksraŋa sivuani salapqiġviksrautaata.

english: For the hidden power of lawlessness is already at work. However, the one who holds him back will do so until he is taken out of the way,
inupiaq: Qanuq uvva qiñiġnaitchuaq suaŋŋataa pigiitchuam savaksaaniŋagaluaqtillugu, taamna paŋmapak pitchaiḷiraġniktuaq piñaiḷutchiqsuiñiaqtuq suli piiqsauniġmiñunaglaan.

english: and then the lawless one will be revealed, whom the Lord will destroy by the breath of his mouth and wipe out by the manifestation of his arrival.
inupiaq: Taamna piñaiḷutchiqsuiruaq piiqpan, tavrani satqummiġñiaqtuq iñuk piḷupiaġataqtuaq. Aasii taamna iñuk Atanġum Jesus tuqunniaġaa aniġniġmiñik, suksraunġiġḷugu qaumaniġmiñik qaigumi.

english: The arrival of the lawless one will be by Satan’s working with all kinds of miracles and signs and false wonders,
inupiaq: Taamna piḷupiaġataqtuaq iñuk qaiñiaqtuq suaŋŋatiqaġluni Satan suaŋŋataanik, nalupqinaiyaġlugu suaŋŋatiqaqtilaani aliuġnaqtualiqiluni sagluqqutinik iñuŋnun.

english: and with every kind of evil deception directed against those who are perishing, because they found no place in their hearts for the truth so as to be saved.
inupiaq: Ilaan pigiitchuakun sagluqiniaġai tamatkiġḷugich suksrauyumaaqtuat, qanuq iliŋisa piviuttaġiŋaitkaat iḷumun ittuaq annautiksraġaluaqtiŋ.

english: Consequently God sends on them a deluding influence so that they will believe what is false.
inupiaq: Aasii ukpiġisuŋiñmarruŋ iḷumun ittuaq, God-im sagluqiraupkaġniaġai, taimmaasii iliŋisa ukpiġilipiallaglugu iḷumun inŋitchuaq.

english: And so all of them who have not believed the truth but have delighted in evil will be condemned.
inupiaq: Aasii taamna pisigilugu iliŋich suksraunġiqsauniaqtut, iluqaġmiŋ tamatkua ukpiqsraŋitchuat iḷumun ittuamik God-ikun, aglaan iñuuruat aliitkutigivlugu piḷuun.

english: But we ought to thank God always for you, brothers and sisters loved by the Lord, because God chose you from the beginning for salvation through sanctification by the Spirit and faith in the truth.
inupiaq: Aglaalli uvagut ataramik quyyatiqaqtuksraupiaqtugut God-mun quyyatigilusi, aniqatiit Atanġum piviuttaġikkaŋasi, qanuq taimaŋŋaqaŋa God-im piksraqtaaġiŋagaasi annaurrautquvlusi, ilaaguaqłusi inmiñun Ilitqusiġiksuakun, ukpiġiliqavsiuŋ iḷumun ittuaq.

english: He called you to this salvation through our gospel, so that you may possess the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.
inupiaq: God-im ququaŋagaasi annaurrautquvlusi tusaayugaaġiksuakun alġaqsruutigikkaptigun, ilivsi piqatautquvlusi kamanaqtuami qaumanġani Atanipta Jesus Christ.

english: Therefore, brothers and sisters, stand firm and hold on to the traditions that we taught you, whether by speech or by letter.
inupiaq: Taamna pisigilugu, aniqatiit, asiñuurraunasi. Tuniqsimavigisigik ukpiġilugich iḷisaurrutivut ilivsiññun nayuŋŋavsi, ami tuyuutivullu.

english: Now may our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father, who loved us and by grace gave us eternal comfort and good hope,
inupiaq: Paŋmapaktuq qapiŋaisaaġusiaqaġitchi Ataniptiŋniñ Jesus Christ-miñ God-miḷḷu aapaptiŋniñ, piviuttaqsriŋaruaŋniñ uvaptiŋnik tilivḷugu Iġñini annautitquvluta, qapiŋaisaaqtuaqtiptiŋniñ ataramik, suli piyummatiqaqtitchiruaŋniñ quvianaqtuamik iliŋikta nagliktuutiqpaŋmikkun.

english: encourage your hearts and strengthen you in every good thing you do or say.
inupiaq: Iliŋiktatuq qapiŋaisaaġlisi uummativsiññi, suli ikayuġlusiḷu iluqaiññi savaavsiññi uqaluvsiññiḷu nakuurualiqipkaġlusi.

english: From Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the command of God our Savior and of Christ Jesus our hope,
inupiaq: Ukua tuyuutit tuyuġigai Paul, tilirautquŋakkaŋata piraksriivḷuni God-im Annaurriptalu Jesus Christ annagummatigikkapta.

english: to Timothy, my genuine child in the faith. Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord!
inupiaq: Tuyuutaurut iliŋnun Timothy, iġñipiaġataptun ittuamun ukpiliqsinŋavlutin Christ-mun. God-tiptuq Aapam Christ-lu Jesus Atanipta iviġaummatigilisin nagligilutillu tutqiutiqaqtillutillu.

english: As I urged you when I was leaving for Macedonia, stay on in Ephesus to instruct certain people not to spread false teachings,
inupiaq: Ephesus-miitqugikpiñ, taimanisun Macedonia-muksaqama apiġipiaŋavlutin. Iñuich iḷaŋich taamani iḷisaurrivḷutiŋ iḷumun inŋitchuanik iḷisaurrutinik, aasii uqallautiraksraġigitin iḷisaurriŋaiqulugich iḷumun inŋitchuanik.

english: nor to occupy themselves with myths and interminable genealogies. Such things promote useless speculations rather than God’s redemptive plan that operates by faith.
inupiaq: Uqautilugich aptatiqaŋaiqulugich unipkaalianik, maŋŋuumiŋniglu takisipiaġataqługich atiqaġviḷiamiŋnik, qanuq tamatkua aguirrutaugiññaġuurut uqaġlaqutiksranun, ikayuutaulaitchut nalautchiñiaġniġmun God-im sivunniuġutiŋiñik, ukpiġunmullu agliḷaaġutaulutiŋ piḷaitchut.

english: But the aim of our instruction is love that comes from a pure heart, a good conscience, and a sincere faith.
inupiaq: Piraksriġikpiñ uqallautitquvlugich iñuich piviuttaqqutimmaġiksaaliquvlugich avanmun, naġġutchaktaŋaiġḷutiŋ isumamiŋni, suli suaŋaruamik ukpiġutiqaquvlugich.

english: Some have strayed from these and turned away to empty discussion.
inupiaq: Iḷaŋich iñuich saquŋarut iḷumun ittuaniñ taŋiġitchuanun uqavaaġutinun.

english: They want to be teachers of the law, but they do not understand what they are saying or the things they insist on so confidently.
inupiaq: Kipiġniuqtut iḷisaurrausukłutiŋ God-im pitquraŋiñik, kaŋiqsigaluaġnagich nallipayaaŋich uqaluŋmiŋ naagga sutigun uqautigikkaġmikkun nalupqinaigivlugich.

english: But we know that the law is good if someone uses it legitimately,
inupiaq: Paŋmapak iḷisimarugut pitqurat nakuutilaaŋannik, kialiqaa atuqpagich God-im sivunniutaatun.

english: realizing that law is not intended for a righteous person, but for lawless and rebellious people, for the ungodly and sinners, for the unholy and profane, for those who kill their fathers or mothers, for murderers,
inupiaq: Qanuq iḷisimarusi God-im pitquraŋi pitquraliaguŋisilaaŋannik iñuŋnun nalaunŋaruanun sivuġaani God-im. Aglaan pitquraliagurut iñuŋnun piḷuusiqirinun uumikłiqsuanun God-mik, tamatkunuŋa paaqłaŋaruanun pitquranik, piḷuktuanun iñuŋnun, god-taiḷaqtuanun, iñuaqtinun aapamiŋnik aakamiŋniglu, iñuaqtuqtinullu,

english: sexually immoral people, practicing homosexuals, kidnappers, liars, perjurers – in fact, for any who live contrary to sound teaching.
inupiaq: allatuqtinullu, aŋutinullu kanŋunaqtuakun atuutiruanun, tainnatuttauq aġnat aġnauqanmiŋnun, iñuŋniglu tigliguuruanun, tamatkunuŋalu sagluturuanun iḷumun inŋitchuanik quliaqtuaqaqłutiŋ, suli piruanun supayaanik paaqsaaŋaruanik nalaunŋaruanun iḷisaurrutinun qanuq God-im pitqutipiaŋiñik.

english: This accords with the glorious gospel of the blessed God that was entrusted to me.
inupiaq: Tamatkua nalaunŋaruat iḷisaurrutit iḷagigai tusaayugaaġiksuam nalunaiqsautigikkaġma uqautigitquvlugich, tusaayugaaġiksuat kamanaqtuamiñ quyyavigiraksrauruamiḷḷu God-miñ.

english: I am grateful to the one who has strengthened me, Christ Jesus our Lord, because he considered me faithful in putting me into ministry,
inupiaq: Quyyavigigiga Christ Jesus Ataniqput suaŋŋasiġmaŋa savakkumiñaqsivḷuŋa. Quyyavigimmigiga nalliummatipkaġmaŋa savaktiksraqtaaġivluŋa inmiñun,

english: even though I was formerly a blasphemer and a persecutor, and an arrogant man. But I was treated with mercy because I acted ignorantly in unbelief,
inupiaq: uvaŋa sivuani uqamaqłuktaugaluaqtilluŋa nagliksaaqtitchivḷuŋalu suli pisaaŋavlugu ilaa. Aglaan God-im nagligiŋagaaŋa pisigivlugu suliqitilaamnik naluniġa ukpiŋaił̣ł̣uŋa.

english: and our Lord’s grace was abundant, bringing faith and love in Christ Jesus.
inupiaq: Ataniqput naglikkutiqpaqaŋaruq uvamnun, suli ukpiliqsiłłuŋa piviuttaġipkallasivḷugiḷḷu allat iñuich pigillakkaptiŋnik atausiŋŋuqatigiŋavlugu Christ Jesus.

english: This saying is trustworthy and deserves full acceptance: “Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners” – and I am the worst of them!
inupiaq: Una uqallautauŋaruaq iḷumun ittuq suli akuqtugaksraupiaqtuq ukpiġilugulu, Christ Jesus qaiŋaruq nunamun annautiyaqtuqługich piḷuktuat iñuich. Aasiuvva uvaŋa piḷuŋniqsrauruŋa piḷuusiqiriniñ.

english: But here is why I was treated with mercy: so that in me as the worst, Christ Jesus could demonstrate his utmost patience, as an example for those who are going to believe in him for eternal life.
inupiaq: Taamna pisigivlugu God-im nagligiŋagaaŋa. Piḷugniqsraugaluaqtilluŋa piḷuusiqiriniñ, Christ manimmiḷguŋagaaŋa annautillasiḷaaqamiŋa. Aasii paŋmapak iḷitchuqqutauyumiñaqtuŋa ilaan manimmiḷgutaanun iluqaiññun ukpiliġumaaqtuanun inmiñun aasii iñuullasiḷutiŋ isuitchuamun.

english: Now to the eternal king, immortal, invisible, the only God, be honor and glory forever and ever! Amen.
inupiaq: Umialik isuitchuamun tuqulaitchuaq, qiñiġnaitchuaq, kisimi God-tauruaq, illi qutchiksuakun isumakkusiaqaġli taimuŋa isuitchuamun. Amen.

english: I put this charge before you, Timothy my child, in keeping with the prophecies once spoken about you, in order that with such encouragement you may fight the good fight.
inupiaq: Timothy iġñiiŋ, piraksriġikpiñ ukpiġnaqtuagutquvlutin savaurriñiġni Ataniġmik. Taamna piraksriutigigiga uqaqtiŋisa God-im ilipkun. Taipkua uqaluata piyummiqsillisin aŋuyagluataġumiñaqsiḷugu pigiitchuaq,

english: To do this you must hold firmly to faith and a good conscience, which some have rejected and so have suffered shipwreck in regard to the faith.
inupiaq: ukpiġnaqtuagulutin savaaġikkaġni, suli iñuullasiḷutin naġġutchaktaġnaitchuakun isumaŋni. Iñuich iḷaŋich tainna iñuuŋitchut aglaan pisaaġiugaqsiññaqłutiŋ sunik iḷisimagaluakkaġmiŋnik piḷuusiqutautilaaŋannik, aasii ukpiġutaiqsivḷutiŋ inmiŋnik.

english: Among these are Hymenaeus and Alexander, whom I handed over to Satan to be taught not to blaspheme.
inupiaq: Tainnaqtuat iñuich iḷagigaich Hymenaeus-lu Alexander-lu, aitchuutigiŋakkaka Satan-mun tatavsaquvlugik, iḷisausiaqaquvlugik uqamaqłuutiqaġumiñaiġḷutik God-mik.

english: First of all, then, I urge that requests, prayers, intercessions, and thanks be offered on behalf of all people,
inupiaq: Tavra apiġipiaġivsi aŋaiyyutigiłhaaquvlugu sivulliġilugu aŋaiyyutilugich iñupayaat, qiññuaqtuutilugich God-mun nagligitqulugich, quyyavigilugu supayaatigun ilaan piñiakkaŋigun pisilugich iñuich.

english: even for kings and all who are in authority, that we may lead a peaceful and quiet life in all godliness and dignity.
inupiaq: Aŋaiyyutilugich umialgich iluqaisalu ataniġnaqusiraqtuat, iñuuyumaugut tuaksruitchuamik tutqigñaqtuamiglu, god-tiliqiruamik isumakkusiaqaġluataqtuamiglu suraġaġnipayaami.

english: Such prayer for all is good and welcomed before God our Savior,
inupiaq: Taamna nakuuruq, suli iviġaumanaqtuq God-mun Annaurriptiŋnun,

english: since he wants all people to be saved and to come to a knowledge of the truth.
inupiaq: kipiġniuqtuamun iñupayaat annaurrautquvlugich suli iḷitchuġitquvlugich ilaan iḷumun ittuaŋanik.

english: For there is one God and one intermediary between God and humanity, Christ Jesus, himself human,
inupiaq: Qanuq atausiuruq God, suli atausiq atisipkaiñiaqti God-miglu iñuŋniglu, iñuk Christ Jesus,

english: who gave himself as a ransom for all, revealing God’s purpose at his appointed time.
inupiaq: piviksraq nalautinman tuqutinŋaruaq inmiñik tasuqsaqługich iñupayaat. Taamna ukpiġnaqsiḷġutauŋaruq God-mun annaurrautqutilaaŋannik iñupayaat.

english: For this I was appointed a preacher and apostle – I am telling the truth; I am not lying – and a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and truth.
inupiaq: Suli taamna pisigivlugu nalunaiqsauŋaruŋa alġaqsruitquvluŋa iḷisaurritquvluŋalu Jew-guŋitchuanik God-im annaurrisaanik iñuŋnik ukpiliġmata. Sagluŋitchuŋa. Iḷumun ittuamik uqaqtuŋa.

english: So I want the men to pray in every place, lifting up holy hands without anger or dispute.
inupiaq: Kipiġniuġutigigiga sumipayaaq iñuich aŋaiyyutquvlugich isaaġutilugich argatiŋ, iñuuniaqtuaguruat iḷumun pisilugu God qinnautaiḷḷutiŋ naagga qanaaġutaiḷḷutiŋ iñupayaanun.

english: Likewise the women are to dress in suitable apparel, with modesty and self-control. Their adornment must not be with braided hair and gold or pearls or expensive clothing,
inupiaq: Aġnat annuġaaqtuqtuksraugaluaqtut qaaŋiulaaŋaŋaiġḷutiŋ isumattutikullu iruġnaiġḷutiŋ annuġaaġlutiŋ. Aġnat ukpiqtuat nalunaigiraksraułhaaŋaiġḷugich nutchiqiniġmikkun, naagga qiñiyunaqusiqsuġniġmikkun uyamitquanik akisuruanik, naagga akitchuuqtinniġnik annuġaanik,

english: but with good deeds, as is proper for women who profess reverence for God.
inupiaq: aglaan iḷisimanałhaaġlutiŋ savaalluatatigun nalliummatiruatigun aġnanun aŋaiyyuliqiniruanun.

english: A woman must learn quietly with all submissiveness.
inupiaq: Aġnat naalaġniruksraurut iḷisaurriruanun nipaisaaġlutiŋ piuniaŋaiġḷutiglu.

english: But I do not allow a woman to teach or exercise authority over a man. She must remain quiet.
inupiaq: Iḷisaurripkaġumiñaitkitka aġnat naaggaunnii ataniġnaqutiqaqulugich aŋutinun. Nipaisaaqtuksraurut.

english: For Adam was formed first and then Eve.
inupiaq: Qanuq Adam iñuġuqtitauqqaaŋaruq, maanna Eve.

english: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman, because she was fully deceived, fell into transgression.
inupiaq: Suli Adam sagluqirauŋaitchuq, aglaan aġnaq sagluqirauŋaruq kamagiŋił̣ł̣ugu God-im pitquraŋa.

english: But she will be delivered through childbearing, if she continues in faith and love and holiness with self-control.
inupiaq: Tavraasii God-im aġnat piqaqtitkai kiiqsiuġunmik isumaaġunmiglu miqłiqtuŋich aniñiaġaġimmata, aglaan ilaan annautiniaġai iliŋisa ukpiġikpanni, iñuuyugaġlutiŋ pialaŋiḷḷutiŋ, nakuulutiŋ, piviuttaġinaqtuanik iñuusiqaġlutiŋ.

english: This saying is trustworthy: “If someone aspires to the office of overseer, he desires a good work.”
inupiaq: Una uqaluk iḷumun ittuq. Kiñaliqaa kipiġniuġumi savaaŋanun umialiŋnaunġum, ilaa kipiġniuqtuq savaaġiksuamik.

english: The overseer then must be above reproach, the husband of one wife, temperate, self-controlled, respectable, hospitable, an able teacher,
inupiaq: Umialiŋnat naġġukkusiagitchuksraurut, atautchimik nuliaqaġlutiŋ, qaaŋiulaaŋaŋiḷḷutiŋ, inmiŋnik aŋalalluataġlutiŋ, pialaŋiḷḷutiŋ, tukkuulutiŋ, iḷisaurriyumiñaġlutiŋ,

english: not a drunkard, not violent, but gentle, not contentious, free from the love of money.
inupiaq: taaŋŋalaiḷḷutiŋ, piaqłuktaiŋiḷḷutiŋ pikałaktaqtuaguŋiḷḷutiŋ, qanaaġuksiññaqtuaguŋiḷḷutiŋ, piviuttaqsrałhaaŋaiġḷutiŋ maniŋmik.

english: He must manage his own household well and keep his children in control without losing his dignity.
inupiaq: Umialiŋnat aŋalalluatapiagaksraġigaich miqłiqtutiŋ, kamaksripkaġlugich, qutchiksuakullu isumakkusiaqallasiḷugich.

english: But if someone does not know how to manage his own household, how will he care for the church of God?
inupiaq: Qanuq iñuk naluruaq aŋalatchiñiġmik miqłiqtumiñik, qanuġluni qaunagiyumiñaqpagich God-im aŋaiyyuliqiruaŋi?

english: He must not be a recent convert or he may become arrogant and fall into the punishment that the devil will exact.
inupiaq: Umialiŋnaġuġniaqtuaq ukpiqtuaguqqammiqsuksrauŋiñmiuq, iḷaanni kamasaaliqpiaqtuq aasii tatavsaqtauluni Tuunġaqtun.

english: And he must be well thought of by those outside the faith, so that he may not fall into disgrace and be caught by the devil’s trap.
inupiaq: Sulivsauq isumakkusiaqaġluataqtuksraummiuq ukpiqtuaġuŋaitchuaniñ. Tainnainŋisuaġumi, ilaa kanŋusaaġutauniaqtuq aŋaiyyuliqiruanun, aasii Tuunġaġmun payaripkaġluni.

english: Deacons likewise must be dignified, not two-faced, not given to excessive drinking, not greedy for gain,
inupiaq: Tiikauruat tainnatuttauq iñuulluataġniaqtuksraummiut, malġuŋnik uqaluqaŋaiġḷutiŋ, imiqpaiñŋaiġḷutiŋ wine-mik, piḷḷatutaiḷḷutiŋ pigiitchuakun maniññaŋniaġniġmun.

english: holding to the mystery of the faith with a clear conscience.
inupiaq: Iliŋisa ukpiġipiagaksraġigaat iḷumun ittuaq nayummataulutiglu iḷumun ittuanun iḷisaurrutinun Christ-kun, qiñiġnaił̣ł̣uni kaŋiuruamun ukpiġunmiŋnun.

english: And these also must be tested first and then let them serve as deacons if they are found blameless.
inupiaq: Suli tiikauruat uuktuaqtauqqaaġlich, aasii iḷumun itilaaqtauganikpata, savarraqsiḷich tiikauruatun.

english: Likewise also their wives must be dignified, not slanderous, temperate, faithful in every respect.
inupiaq: Nuliaŋich tainnatuttauq iñuulluataġniaqtuksraummiut, uqqaqtuŋaiġḷutiŋ, aglaan qaaŋiulaaŋaŋiḷḷutiŋ, pitqiksiġautaiḷḷutiŋ supayaakun.

english: Deacons must be husbands of one wife and good managers of their children and their own households.
inupiaq: Tiikauruat nuliaqaġlich atautchimik, suli aŋalallisigik miqłiqtutiŋ igluqatitiglu iłuatun,

english: For those who have served well as deacons gain a good standing for themselves and great boldness in the faith that is in Christ Jesus.
inupiaq: qanuq tamatkua savaurriḷḷuataqtuat tiikauniġmi piññaktut qutchiksuakun isumakkusiamik inmiŋnun aasii uqautiqaġumiñaqtut ukpiġun mik taluqsrautaiḷḷutiŋ pigikkaptiŋnik atausiŋŋuqatigikaptigu Christ Jesus.

english: I hope to come to you soon, but I am writing these instructions to you
inupiaq: Tuyuksriullaġma ukuniŋa tuyuutinik piyummatiqaqtuŋa ullagumavlutin tautuŋnasuaġukłutin.

english: in case I am delayed, to let you know how people ought to conduct themselves in the household of God, because it is the church of the living God, the support and bulwark of the truth.
inupiaq: Aglaan qaikallaŋisiġuma ukua tuyuutit iḷisimapkaġniaġaatin qanuq iñuusiqaqtuksrautilaaptiŋnik God-mun igluqatauniptiŋni, aŋaiyyuliqiruaguvluta iñuuruamun God-mun. Ilaan aŋaiyyuliqiruaŋi tamatkuagurut kamaksriruat, ukpiġnaqtuakullu nayummataurut iḷisaurriruat God-im iḷumun ittuamik uqaluanik.

english: And we all agree, our religion contains amazing revelation:
inupiaq: Kialiqaa piiḷaaġiyumiñaitkaa qanutun kamanaġniŋa kaŋiqsiñaiñŋaruam ukpiġikkapta. Christ qiñiġnaqsiŋaruq timiqaqłuni iñuktun, iḷumun inniŋagaa Ilitqusiġiksuam, tautuŋagaat isaġulgich. Ilaa alġaqsruutauŋaruq akunġanni nunauruat, ukpiġiŋagaat iñuich, mayuurrauŋaruq qiḷaŋmun.

english: He was revealed in the flesh,
vindicated by the Spirit,
seen by angels,
proclaimed among Gentiles,
believed on in the world,
taken up in glory.
Now the Spirit explicitly says that in the later times some will desert the faith and occupy themselves with deceiving spirits and demonic teachings,
inupiaq: Ilitqusiġiksuam nalupqinaiqł̣ugu uqallausiġigai iñuich iḷaŋich ukpiġutaiġñiaġnivḷugich aqulliġñi uvluni, kamagilugich sagluqinniktuat ilitqutchich, maliġuaġlutiglu ilitqusiqł̣uich iḷisaurrutiŋiññik.

english: influenced by the hypocrisy of liars whose consciences are seared.
inupiaq: Tamatkua iḷisaurrutiginiaġaich ukpiŋŋuaqtuat sagluturuaguvlutiŋ, naġġutchapayaayuitchuatunnii isumamiŋni iḷisaurrikamiŋ tamatkuniŋa saglunik.

english: They will prohibit marriage and require abstinence from foods that God created to be received with thanksgiving by those who believe and know the truth.
inupiaq: Tainnatchich iñuich iḷisaurrirut killukuaŋanivḷugu tuvaaqatiniktuni, niġiruniḷu niqit iḷaŋiññik. Aglaan God-im savaŋagai niqiksrat niġitquvlugich quyyatigiqqaaġlugich aŋaiyyutikun, tamatkunuŋa ukpiqtuanun suli iḷitchuġiŋaruanun iḷumun ittuamik.

english: For every creation of God is good and no food is to be rejected if it is received with thanksgiving.
inupiaq: Qanuq supayaat savaaġiŋarai God-im nakuurut, suli sunaliqaa ayyagaksrauŋitchuq, aglaan akuqtugaksrauruq quyyatigilugu aŋaiyyutikun,

english: For it is sanctified by God’s word and by prayer.
inupiaq: qanuq uqaluata God-im aŋaiyyutivlu akuqtuġnaġumiñaqsigaak God-mun.

english: By pointing out such things to the brothers and sisters, you will be a good servant of Christ Jesus, having nourished yourself on the words of the faith and of the good teaching that you have followed.
inupiaq: Ilivich iḷisaurrutigigupkich tamatkua aniqatinun kivgaulluataġniaqtutin Christ Jesus-mun, suaŋasiñiaġutigillaan ukpiġutin God-im iḷumun ittuanik iḷisaurrutiŋiñik ilivich kamagivlugich.

english: But reject those myths fit only for the godless and gullible, and train yourself for godliness.
inupiaq: Iḷaksianagich god-taiḷautikun ittuat asiḷiqqutikullu unipkaat. Ayuġaksaġiñ iliŋnik iñuusuglutin God-im iñuutqutaagun iliŋnun.

english: For “physical exercise has some value, but godliness is valuable in every way. It holds promise for the present life and for the life to come.”
inupiaq: Qanuq timim qiġġaiyaġniŋa anniqsuusiaqaġnaġaluaġmiuq, god-tiliqiniq anniqsuutiqałhaaqtuq qanusipayaakun, unniqsuqłiisiqaqłuni paŋmapak iñuutchimun suli iñuggunmun isuitchuamun.

english: This saying is trustworthy and deserves full acceptance.
inupiaq: Taamna iḷumun ittuq uqaluk akuqtugaksraupiaqtuq ukpiġilugulu.

english: In fact this is why we work hard and struggle, because we have set our hope on the living God, who is the Savior of all people, especially of believers.
inupiaq: Taamna sivuniġivlugu siġġaqirugut savautivlugu siġḷiqivluta iñuuruaq God, niġiugikkaqput annautiniaġnivḷuta, annaurrigiyumiñaġaluakkaŋat iñupayaurat, tamatkuałhaaq ukpiqtuat.

english: Command and teach these things.
inupiaq: Tamatkua iñuŋnun piraksriutigikkich iḷisaurrutigilugiḷḷu.

english: Let no one look down on you because you are young, but set an example for the believers in your speech, conduct, love, faithfulness, and purity.
inupiaq: Kialiqaa suuŋiḷaġiŋaiḷḷisin nutauniḷutin, aglaan tuvraaksrikkich ukpiqtuaguruat uqaġnipkun iñuuniaġnipkullu piviuttaqsriñipkullu ukpiġutipkullu iñuulluataġnipkullu.

english: Until I come, give attention to the public reading of scripture, to exhortation, to teaching.
inupiaq: Qaitchiaġiluŋa, atuġuŋ piviksran taiguaġlugich Bible uqaluŋich kasimaruani, alġaqsruiḷutillu iḷisaurriḷutillu.

english: Do not neglect the spiritual gift you have, given to you and confirmed by prophetic words when the elders laid hands on you.
inupiaq: Atupiaġatakkich piḷḷasipkakkaŋi God-im aitchuutiŋi iliŋnun, satqummiŋakkaŋich God-im uqaqtiŋisa umialiŋnat iḷimmatigik argatiŋ iliŋnun ilaaguaqłutin savaaksriusiaġnun.

english: Take pains with these things; be absorbed in them, so that everyone will see your progress.
inupiaq: Atuqtuiññakkich tamatkua piḷḷasipkausiatin ataramik, iñuich iluqaġmiŋ tautukkumagaat sivunmuktuġniġiñ.

english: Be conscientious about how you live and what you teach. Persevere in this, because by doing so you will save both yourself and those who listen to you.
inupiaq: Qaunakkuiñ iliŋnun, qaunagilugiḷḷu qanuq iḷisaurrisilaaġnik. Tainna pituiññaġuvich, annautipkallasiñiaqtutin iliŋnun tamatkualu tusaaruat iliŋnik.

english: Do not address an older man harshly but appeal to him as a father. Speak to younger men as brothers,
inupiaq: Suaŋnagu utuqqanaaq aglaan araktuaġuŋ aapagimmatun. Aŋalatkich nukatpiat aniqatiktun iḷiḷugich.

english: older women as mothers, and younger women as sisters – with complete purity.
inupiaq: Utuqqanaat aġnat aŋalatkich aakagimmatun, suli niviaqsiat aniqatiktun, aŋalallugich piḷuutaitchuakun.

english: Honor widows who are truly in need.
inupiaq: Suuŋiḷaġinagich uiḷgaŋaruat ikayuqtiqaqtuksraupiaqtuat.

english: But if a widow has children or grandchildren, they should first learn to fulfill their duty toward their own household and so repay their parents what is owed them. For this is what pleases God.
inupiaq: Uiḷgaŋaruaq miqłiqtuqaqpan naagga tutaaluuqaqpan piḷḷasiŋaruanik, tamatkua qaunagilirruŋ ilaa, puttuqsriḷutiŋ tainna pigumiŋ paaqłiiñiḷuktilaamiŋnik aŋayuqaamiŋnik ataataamiŋniglu, aasii tainna pikamiŋ savaurrirut God-mik, iviġakługulu.

english: But the widow who is truly in need, and completely on her own, has set her hope on God and continues in her pleas and prayers night and day.
inupiaq: Aġnaq uiḷgaŋaruaq qaunaksriksraił̣ł̣uni niġiuktuaguruq ikayuusiaksramiñik God-miñ, aasii aŋaiyyuuqłuni apiġivlugu unnuakkaluami uvlumiḷu ilaanun ikayuquvluni.

english: But the one who lives for pleasure is dead even while she lives.
inupiaq: Aglaalli uiḷgaŋaruaq qaunakł̣aaŋił̣ł̣uni aliasuŋiññiaqsiññaqtuaq, iñuugaluaŋŋaġmi tuquŋaruatun ittuq sivuġaani God-im.

english: Reinforce these commands, so that they will be beyond reproach.
inupiaq: Taavrumiŋa piraksrikkich, pasiñaġumiñaitchumaut.

english: But if someone does not provide for his own, especially his own family, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
inupiaq: Kiñaliqaa pamatchiŋitkumi nanmiñiġmiñik, taapkuniŋałhaaqami nanmiñiq qitunġamiñik, iñuuŋitchuq tuvraġlugu ukpiġikkaqput, aasii pigiił̣haaqtuq unnii ukpiŋaitchuamiñ.

english: No widow should be put on the list unless she is at least sixty years old, was the wife of one husband,
inupiaq: Kiñapayaaq kisiuqatiginagu uiḷgaŋaruanun ukiuqaqtuaq inuqsimalugu piŋasukipiaq ukiuq. Aasiisuli uiñiŋaruksrauruq atautchimi.

english: and has a reputation for good works: as one who has raised children, practiced hospitality, washed the feet of the saints, helped those in distress – as one who has exhibited all kinds of good works.
inupiaq: Suli uiḷgaŋaruaq uqausikkusiaqaġluataqtuksrauruq savaalluatamigun, iñukkuksaiḷḷuataŋaluni miqłiqtumiñik, tukkuliisuuluniḷu iglaanik aimaaġviŋmiñun, iqaġisuulugiḷḷu ukpiqtuat isigaŋich, ikayuġuulugiḷḷu iłuiḷḷiuqtuat, nakuurualiqiluniḷu qanusipayaakun.

english: But do not accept younger widows on the list, because their passions may lead them away from Christ and they will desire to marry,
inupiaq: Aglaan iḷaḷiutinagich uiḷgaŋaruanun nutauŋŋaġmiŋ uiḷgaŋaruat. Qanuq pisuguunmiŋni uiñigulitqikkumiŋ saquniaqtut savaurriḷḷuataġniksramiŋniñ Christ-mik,

english: and so incur judgment for breaking their former pledge.
inupiaq: aasii tainna pikamiŋ pasiraurut navguiñikun unniqsuqłiisiqqaamiŋnik ilaanun.

english: And besides that, going around from house to house they learn to be lazy, and they are not only lazy, but also gossips and busybodies, talking about things they should not.
inupiaq: Taamnatualuuŋiñmiuq, iḷisaqtut iḷatchiġñiġmik, kukiḷuksiññaqłutiŋ igluniñ iglunun, aasiisuli pigiił̣haaqtuaq iḷisaqługu uqqaqtuniq, iḷaksianniktuagurullu uqaqłutiŋ uqaluksraġiŋisamiŋnik.

english: So I want younger women to marry, raise children, and manage a household, in order to give the adversary no opportunity to vilify us.
inupiaq: Tamatkua pisigivlugich nutauvlutiŋ uiḷgaŋaruat tuvaaqatiniqugitka, miqłiqsiuġlich, qaunagilugiḷḷu aimaaġvisiŋ, uumigirivut uqautikkutiksraitchumaut pigiitchuamik uvaptigun.

english: For some have already wandered away to follow Satan.
inupiaq: Qanuq iḷaŋich uiḷgaŋaruat asivaaniŋarut malikługu Tuunġaq.

english: If a believing woman has widows in her family, let her help them. The church should not be burdened, so that it may help the widows who are truly in need.
inupiaq: Kiñaliqaa ukpiqtuaguruaq uiḷgaŋaruaqaġumi qitunġaamiñi ilaan qaunagiraksraġigai, aasii naŋniŋiḷḷugich aŋaiyyuliqiruat ikayuiyumaut uiḷgaŋaruanik ikayuqtiksraipiaqtuanik.

english: Elders who provide effective leadership must be counted worthy of double honor, especially those who work hard in speaking and teaching.
inupiaq: Umialiŋnat aŋalatchiḷḷuataqtuat aullarrauniġmik nalliummatirut malġuktun akiḷiusiamik, tamatkuałhaaq siġġaqiruat alġaqsruivḷutiŋ iḷisaurrivḷutiglu,

english: For the scripture says, “Do not muzzle an ox while it is treading out the grain,” and, “The worker deserves his pay.”
inupiaq: qanuq Bible uqaluŋich uqaqtut inna, “Sigguġutituġniaŋitkiñ qimukti amiġaiyairuaq tunmaqługich palauvaksrat,” suli “Savakti nalliummatiruq akiññaktaaksramiñun.”

english: Do not accept an accusation against an elder unless it can be confirmed by two or three witnesses.
inupiaq: Naalaġniñasi suuramikunnii pasikkusiaŋagun umialiŋnam, malġuk naagga piŋasut uqautigiŋisuaqparruŋ pasiḷugu.

english: Those guilty of sin must be rebuked before all, as a warning to the rest.
inupiaq: Tamatkuali sivunmuuruat piḷuunmi, suakkich takkuanni iñuich iluqaġmiŋ, kisiŋŋuqtat piḷuksiŋitchuat sivuuqqatiqaġumaut piḷuksiñiksramun.

english: Before God and Christ Jesus and the elect angels, I solemnly charge you to carry out these commands without prejudice or favoritism of any kind.
inupiaq: Takkuaŋni God-im Christ-lu Jesus piḷuutaitchuallu isaġulgich, piraksripiaġikpiñ kamagitquvlugich tamatkua piraksriutitka, iñuich iḷaŋich iviġaumagiłhaaŋaiġḷugich allaniñ iñuŋniñ supayaatigun ilivich pikkapkun.

english: Do not lay hands on anyone hastily and so identify with the sins of others. Keep yourself pure.
inupiaq: Qilamiqsruuttaġinagu iḷisiñiaġniq argaŋnik ilaaguaqsiñiksramun iñuŋmik savaaŋanun Atanġum. Patchisauyumiñaqsiñak allat iñuich piḷuutiŋiññun. Qaunakkuiñ iliŋnik piḷuutaitchuglutin.

english: (Stop drinking just water, but use a little wine for your digestion and your frequent illnesses.)
inupiaq: Tavraŋŋaaglaan imiqaġnak imiłhiñamik, aglaan wine-tułaurallaalutin pisigilugu aqiaqqun, qanuq naŋitchuurutin akulaitchuamik.

english: The sins of some people are obvious, going before them into judgment, but for others, they show up later.
inupiaq: Piḷuutiŋich iñuich iḷaŋisa nalunaitchut, aasii taamna pisigilugu nalupqinaitchuq isivġiqsauniaqtut. Aglaan piḷuutiŋich allat iḷisimanaqsiñiaqtut aquvatigun.

english: Similarly good works are also obvious, and the ones that are not cannot remain hidden.
inupiaq: Tainnatuttauq savaalluatat nalunaiñmiut, nalunaiñŋitkaluaġumikunnii iriqsimaanikkumiñaitchut.

english: From Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, to further the promise of life in Christ Jesus,
inupiaq: Ukua tuyuutit iliŋnun qairut Paul-miñ, Jesus Christ tiliraŋaniñ, qanuq God tainna pitqurimman. Paul tilirauŋaruq quliaqtuaġitquvlugu unniqsuqłiisauŋaruaq iñuggun pigiliutisuukkaqput atausiŋŋuqatigikaptigu Christ Jesus.

english: to Timothy, my dear child. Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord!
inupiaq: Tuyuutaurut Timothy-mun piqpagivlugu iġñiġimmatun itamnun. God-im Aapauruam Christ Jesus-lu Atanipta iviġaumanautilisin, nagligilisin, tutqiutiqaqtillisillu.

english: I am thankful to God, whom I have served with a clear conscience as my ancestors did, when I remember you in my prayers as I do constantly night and day.
inupiaq: Quyyavigigiga God savautikkaġa naġġukkutaitchuakun isumami, isumaqausiatitun maŋŋuuma. Quyyavigigiga ataramik aŋaiyyutimni unnuakkaluami uvlumiḷu,

english: As I remember your tears, I long to see you, so that I may be filled with joy.
inupiaq: itqaqapkulu qulviŋatilaan, kipiġniuqtuŋa tautugukłutin, quviatchakpagukłuŋa.

english: I recall your sincere faith that was alive first in your grandmother Lois and in your mother Eunice, and I am sure is in you.
inupiaq: Itqaġiga iḷumutuuqtuamik ukpiġutiqaqtilaan, ukpiġutiqausiatun aanavich Lois aakaviḷḷu Eunice. Aasii paŋmapak nalupqisuŋitchuŋa ukpiġutiqaġmiutin.

english: Because of this I remind you to rekindle God’s gift that you possess through the laying on of my hands.
inupiaq: Taamna pisigivlugu, itqaqtitchukkikpiñ igliqtitquvlugu God-im aitchuutaa iḷikapkich argatka iliŋnun.

english: For God did not give us a Spirit of fear but of power and love and self-control.
inupiaq: Qanuq Ilitqusiġiksuam God-im aitchuutaata iqsisaiġaatigut suaŋŋasiŋagaatigullu, piviuttaqqusiqł̣utalu, uvaptiŋniglu aŋalalluataġumiñaqsivḷuta.

english: So do not be ashamed of the testimony about our Lord or of me, a prisoner for his sake, but by God’s power accept your share of suffering for the gospel.
inupiaq: Kanŋutchaktitaunak quliaqtuaġigupku Ataniqput, naaggaunnii uvaŋa tigutaaqtauruaŋaa alġaqsruiñiġa pisigivlugu, aglaan akuqtuġuŋ nagliksaaġniġiñ pisigivlugu tusaayugaaġiksuaq, qanutun God-im suaŋŋasiqsuqpatin.

english: He is the one who saved us and called us with a holy calling, not based on our works but on his own purpose and grace, granted to us in Christ Jesus before time began,
inupiaq: God-im annautiŋagaatigut suli ququaqłuta ilaan iñuggusiqł̣uta pisigisuŋaġnagich uvagut savaavut, aglaan pisigivlugu ilaan sivunniutini nagliktuutiqpaniḷu. Ilaa sivunniuŋaruq nuna isagutiŋaiñŋaan nagliktuutikun annautisukłuta Jesus Christ-kun,

english: but now made visible through the appearing of our Savior Christ Jesus. He has broken the power of death and brought life and immortality to light through the gospel!
inupiaq: aasii paŋmapak salapqiqł̣ugu niptaġniŋagun Annaurripta Christ Jesus. Christ-gum suksraunġiŋagaa tuqqun aasii qaġġisivlugu iñuggun tuqunaitchuaq tusaayugaaġiksuakun.

english: For this gospel I was appointed a preacher and apostle and teacher.
inupiaq: God-im piksraqtaaġiŋagaaŋa quliaqtuaġitquvlugu tusaayugaaġiksuaq, tiliraupkaqłuŋa iḷisaurripkaqłuŋalu.

english: Because of this, in fact, I suffer as I do. But I am not ashamed, because I know the one in whom my faith is set and I am convinced that he is able to protect what has been entrusted to me until that day.
inupiaq: Aasii taamna pisigivlugu nagliksaaqtuŋa nagliksaaġusivsun. Aglaan kanŋutchaktitauŋitchuŋa, qanuq iḷisimagiga ukpiġvigiŋakkaġa, suli nalupqisuŋitchuŋa ilaan qaunaginiaġaa taamna savaaksrirrutini uvamnun isivġiġvik tikiḷġataqtillugu.

english: Hold to the standard of sound words that you heard from me and do so with the faith and love that are in Christ Jesus.
inupiaq: Ukpiġiŋaiġñagich iḷumun ittuat uqaluich iḷisaurrutitka iliŋnun, maliġuagaksratin iñuuniaġuvich, ukpiġutiqaqtuiññaġlutin piviuttaqqutiqaġlutillu pigikkaptiŋnik atausiŋŋuqatigikaptigu Christ Jesus.

english: Protect that good thing entrusted to you, through the Holy Spirit who lives within us.
inupiaq: Qaunagikkich nalaunŋaruat iḷisaurrutit aitchuutauŋaruat iliŋnun ikayuutaagun suaŋŋataata Ilitqusiġiksuam iñuuruam iḷuptiŋni.

english: You know that everyone in the province of Asia deserted me, including Phygelus and Hermogenes.
inupiaq: Iḷisimarutin iluqaiññun Asia-miittuanun qimaktilaamnik, iḷagivlugik Phygelus-lu Hermogenes-lu.

english: May the Lord grant mercy to the family of Onesiphorus, because he often refreshed me and was not ashamed of my imprisonment.
inupiaq: Atanġuptuq nagligiligich igluqatiŋi Onesiphorus, qanuq ilaan akulaitchuami qapiŋaisaaġuugaaŋa. Ilaan kanŋusuutigiŋaitkaaŋa pisigilugu tigutaaqtauniġa,

english: But when he arrived in Rome, he eagerly searched for me and found me.
inupiaq: aglaan tikipqauraqami Rome-mun ilaan ivaŋagaaŋa, aasii paqiłłuŋa.

english: May the Lord grant him to find mercy from the Lord on that day! And you know very well all the ways he served me in Ephesus.
inupiaq: Atanġuptuq nagliktuusiaqaqtilliuŋ Ataniġmiñ isivġiġviŋmi. Iḷisimalluataqtutin qanutun ikayuisilaaŋanik uvamnik Ephesus-mi.

english: So you, my child, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.
inupiaq: Ilivich aasii, iġñiiŋ, qapiŋairrutiqaġiñ savaaġni nagliktuusiaqpakun pigikkaptigun atausiŋŋuqatigikaptigu Christ Jesus.

english: And entrust what you heard me say in the presence of many others as witnesses to faithful people who will be competent to teach others as well.
inupiaq: Uqaluich tusaaŋakkatin uvamniñ alġaqsruikama iñugiaktuanun iñuŋnun, ilivich qaaŋiqsitkich pigitqulugich iñuŋnun nalupqigiŋisaġnun iḷisaurriyumiñaqtuanun allaniktauq iñuŋnik.

english: Take your share of suffering as a good soldier of Christ Jesus.
inupiaq: Piqasiuttuiñ nagliksaaġniġmi pisigilugu tusaayugaaġiksuaq aŋuyaktigiksuaŋatun Christ Jesus.

english: No one in military service gets entangled in matters of everyday life; otherwise he will not please the one who recruited him.
inupiaq: Aŋuyakti aŋuyaktaullaġmi aptatiqalaitchuq aŋuyaktauŋitchuam savaaŋiñik, qanuq ilaan iviġagukkaa aŋuyaktini atanaurani.

english: Also, if anyone competes as an athlete, he will not be crowned as the winner unless he competes according to the rules.
inupiaq: Aqpaliurraqti aqpaliurraqtuaq akiññalaitchuq isagunŋaŋisuaqami nalaullugich pitqurriutit aqpaliurraġniġmi.

english: The farmer who works hard ought to have the first share of the crops.
inupiaq: Nautchiriqiri siġḷiqiruaq savakami piqaqqaaqtuksrauruq sivulliġñik nauruanik.

english: Think about what I am saying and the Lord will give you understanding of all this.
inupiaq: Isumalaaġutigikkich sut uqautigikkatka uuktuutit, qanuq Atanġum kaŋiqsipkaġniaġaatin taapkunuuna uqautigikkapkun.

english: Remember Jesus Christ, raised from the dead, a descendant of David; such is my gospel,
inupiaq: Itqaumauŋ Jesus Christ, aŋipkaqtauŋaruaq tuqqunmiñ, maŋŋuqaqtuaq David-miñ, alġaqsruutiptun tusaayugaaġiksuanik.

english: for which I suffer hardship to the point of imprisonment as a criminal, but God’s message is not imprisoned!
inupiaq: Alġaqsruutigikkaġa tusaayugaaġiksuaq pisigivlugu nagliksaaqtuŋa, tigutaaqtauruŋaunnii pitquranik navguiritun. Aglaan God-im uqalua piñaiḷutaitchuq.

english: So I endure all things for the sake of those chosen by God, that they too may obtain salvation in Christ Jesus and its eternal glory.
inupiaq: Taamna pisigivlugu igḷutuġitka supayaat pisigivlugich God-im iñuksraqtaaŋi, iliŋitchauq annaurrautquvlugich Christ Jesus-kun, iñuutquvlugiḷḷu qiḷaŋmi isuitchuamun.

english: This saying is trustworthy:
inupiaq: Una uqaluk nalupqinaitchuq.

english: If we died with him, we will also live with him.
inupiaq: Itqaqtittaġukkich iñuktin taavrumiŋa, suli kiliglugich sivuġaani Atanġum pitchaiḷitqulugich uqaluŋnik qanaaġutiksrauruanik. Anniqsuutaulaitchut, aglaan maqutchisuurut iñuŋnik naalaġniruanik.

english: If we endure, we will also reign with him.
inupiaq: Pisuqtilaaġiñ iviġagluataġniapiaġlugu God iñuktun kanŋusuutiqaġumiñaitchuatun savaamiñik, nalaunŋaruakun iḷisaurriḷutin God-im uqaluŋiñik iḷumun ittuanik.

english: If we deny him, he will also deny us.
inupiaq: Uqavaaqatiginagich god-taitchuat asiḷiqqutikullu uqavaaqtuat. Qanuq uŋusiññaġuugaich iñuich god-taiḷaġniġmun,

english: If we are unfaithful, he remains faithful, since he cannot deny himself.
inupiaq: iḷisaurrutiŋich ittut kiḷḷiġruanilġiñaqtuatun uviñik nuŋuuqtuaqługu. Malġuk tainnatchik iññuk iḷisaurrik Hymenaeus-lu Philetus-lu.

english: Remind people of these things and solemnly charge them before the Lord not to wrangle over words. This is of no benefit; it just brings ruin on those who listen.
inupiaq: Taapkuak iññuk ukpiġiŋaiŋagaak iḷumun ittuaq, aasii ukpiqtuat iḷaŋich ukpiġutaiqsiłługich, iḷumun inŋitchuamik iḷisaurrivḷutik aŋŋisikput qaaŋianignivḷugu.

english: Make every effort to present yourself before God as a proven worker who does not need to be ashamed, teaching the message of truth accurately.
inupiaq: Aglaan God-im iḷumun ittuaŋa allaŋŋulaitchuq, iłłuni aulayaitchuatun maŋŋuliutitun aulayyaŋnaġumiñaitchuatun. Aasii ukua malġuich uqaluich God-im aglaaŋi aglagivlugich, “Atanġum iḷisimagai ilaan iñuŋni,” suli, “Kiñaliqaa Atanġum iñugikkaŋa piḷuusiqiugaŋaiġḷi.”

english: But avoid profane chatter, because those occupied with it will stray further and further into ungodliness,
inupiaq: Suġalliruam igluqpakpaŋani qanusiḷimaat utkusiich pugguttallu ittut. Tamatkua utkutchiagurut puggutchiagurullu iḷaŋich maniŋñiñ qatiqtuaniñ suli iḷaŋich kaviqsuaniñ maniŋñiñ, iḷaŋitchauq qiruŋniñ suli iḷaŋich qikumiñ. Akisuruat utkusiich puggutallu atuqługich tuyuġmiaqaqamiŋ kisianik aasii akiiññiqsrat ataramik atuqługich iḷaŋich suaqłuqaġvigivlugich.

english: and their message will spread its infection like gangrene. Hymenaeus and Philetus are in this group.
inupiaq: Tainnatulli ilivsi qanupayaaq piḷuusiqilaitkuvsi inniaqtusi akisuruatun utkusiksun puggutatullu ilaaguaqtauruatun atugaksrauvlugu kisianun Christ pitqukkaŋanun, itqanaitchuatun atuggaksrauvluni qanusipayaamun savaaġiksuamun.

english: They have strayed from the truth by saying that the resurrection has already occurred, and they are undermining some people’s faith.
inupiaq: Tavra kamaginagich pigiitchuat pisuguutiŋi nutaġaunġum, aglaan sivuniqaġlutin iłuaqtualiqiniġmik ukpiġunmik, piviuttaqqunmik, tutqiunmiglu, piqatigilugich tamatkua piḷuutaitchuakun ququularuat Ataniġmun ikayuquvlutiŋ.

english: However, God’s solid foundation remains standing, bearing this seal: “The Lord knows those who are his,” and “Everyone who confesses the name of the Lord must turn away from evil.”
inupiaq: Iḷaksianagich naluvlutiŋ isumalluaġiirrutikun qapiqtaiḷisuuruat, iḷisimarutin isagutipkaġuugaich qanaaġutit.

english: Now in a wealthy home there are not only gold and silver vessels, but also ones made of wood and of clay, and some are for honorable use, but others for ignoble use.
inupiaq: Atanġum kivgaŋa qanaayuktuksrauŋitchuq, suli piaqłuktautaitchuksrauruq iñupayaamun, nakuuluni qimmaksaliyaiḷḷuniḷu iḷisaurriḷuni

english: So if someone cleanses himself of such behavior, he will be a vessel for honorable use, set apart, useful for the Master, prepared for every good work.
inupiaq: natqiksruġlugich pikałaktautairrutikun akiḷḷiḷiqsuutiruat God-mun, iḷaanni God-im isumalitqiksitaupkaqpiaġai suli iḷitchuġipkaġlugich iḷumun ittuamik.

english: But keep away from youthful passions, and pursue righteousness, faithfulness, love, and peace, in company with others who call on the Lord from a pure heart.
inupiaq: Aasii qauriruatun piñiaqtut annakkumiñaqsiḷutiŋ nigatchiaŋaniñ Tuunġaum kamaksripkaiyugaŋaruam iliŋiññik pisuunmiñik.

english: But reject foolish and ignorant controversies, because you know they breed infighting.
And the Lord’s slave must not engage in heated disputes but be kind toward all, an apt teacher, patient,
correcting opponents with gentleness. Perhaps God will grant them repentance and then knowledge of the truth
and they will come to their senses and escape the devil’s trap where they are held captive to do his will.
But understand this, that in the last days difficult times will come.
inupiaq: Aglaan kaŋiqsisiuŋ una, siġḷiġniuġutit iḷiñiaqtut aqulliġñi uvluni.

english: For people will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, arrogant, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, ungrateful, unholy,
inupiaq: Qanuq iñuich siŋñatusiñiaqtut piḷḷatusiḷutiŋ, kamasaaliġḷutiŋ, uqavigaaliġḷutiŋ, uqamaqłuurriḷiġḷutiŋ kamaksriḷḷaiġḷutiŋ aŋayuqaamiŋnik, quyyataiġḷutiŋ, pigiitchualiqilutiglu,

english: unloving, irreconcilable, slanderers, without self-control, savage, opposed to what is good,
inupiaq: suli anayasuktuaŋaiġñiaqtut, nagliksrautaiġḷutiglu, tiġliraqłiḷiġḷutiglu, piaqłuktaliġḷutiglu, iqsiñaqsiḷutiglu, uumigiliġmiḷugu suna nakuuruaq.

english: treacherous, reckless, conceited, loving pleasure rather than loving God.
inupiaq: Aitchuutiginnigniaqtut iḷauraamiŋnik, isumamiŋni sivunmuusuusiḷutiŋ, kamasaalipiaġataġlutiŋ, piviuttaġiłhaaliġḷugu aliasuŋisaaġun piviuttaqsriñiġmiñ God-mik.

english: They will maintain the outward appearance of religion but will have repudiated its power. So avoid people like these.
inupiaq: Piraġausiġiniaġaluaġaich qanusipayaat aŋaiyyuliqinikun piraġausiuruat, God-im suaŋŋataanun allaŋŋuqtinniaġnagich iñuutchisiŋ. Piqataunak tainnatchiñun iñuŋnun.

english: For some of these insinuate themselves into households and captivate weak women who are overwhelmed with sins and led along by various passions.
inupiaq: Iñuich iḷaŋich tainnatchit pitqiksuat isiġuurut aimaaġviŋiññun iñuich aasii payarivḷugich piyaruat aġnat tutqiutaiḷḷuqtuat piḷuutitiŋ pisigivlugich, aŋalatiłłutiŋ qanusipayaanun god-taiḷaġnikun kipiġniuġutinun,

english: Such women are always seeking instruction, yet never able to arrive at a knowledge of the truth.
inupiaq: aġnat naalaġniyumaŋitchuat kimulliqaa uqaurrimiŋnun, suli iḷitchuqsriḷḷaigutiruat God-im iḷumun ittuaŋanik.

english: And just as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses, so these people – who have warped minds and are disqualified in the faith – also oppose the truth.
inupiaq: Jannes-tullu Jambres-tullu akiḷḷiḷiqsuiŋaruaktun Moses-mik, tainnatuttauq tamatkua iḷisaurriŋŋuat akiḷḷiḷiqsuġmigaat God-im iḷumun ittuaŋa, iñuich isumaqaqtuat pigiitchuanik ukpiġutiŋŋuamiglu.

english: But they will not go much further, for their foolishness will be obvious to everyone, just like it was with Jannes and Jambres.
inupiaq: Aglaan ayuupiaġumiñaitchut, qanuq iñupayaat iḷitchuġiniaġaich isumalluaġiirrutiŋich nalunaiqpata taipkuŋnatuttauq Jannes-tullu Jambres-tullu.

english: You, however, have followed my teaching, my way of life, my purpose, my faith, my patience, my love, my endurance,
inupiaq: Aglaan ilivich maliġuaŋagiñ iḷisaurrutiga, aullasiġalu, sivuniġalu iñuggunmi, ukpiġutigalu, qiñuirrutigalu, piviuttaqqutigalu, tuniqsimmatigalu,

english: as well as the persecutions and sufferings that happened to me in Antioch, in Iconium, and in Lystra. I endured these persecutions and the Lord delivered me from them all.
inupiaq: nagliksaaqtirrusiatkalu, iłuiḷḷiuġutitkalu. Iḷisimarutin sunik piruanik uvamnun Antioch-mi Iconium-miḷu Lystra-miḷu nagliksaaqtirrutiqpaich igḷutukkatka, aasii iḷisimammiutin Atanġum iñuuliŋagaaŋa iluqaiññiñ tamatkunaŋŋa.

english: Now in fact all who want to live godly lives in Christ Jesus will be persecuted.
inupiaq: Iluqaġmiŋ god-tiliqilutiŋ iñuusiqaġuktuat atausiŋŋuqatigiŋavlugu Christ Jesus nagliksaaqtitauniaqtut,

english: But evil people and charlatans will go from bad to worse, deceiving others and being deceived themselves.
inupiaq: tamatkuali pigiitchuat iñuich piŋŋuaqtillu iglaupkaġlugich piḷuktuamiñ piḷuksisaiññanmun, sagluqinniŋniaqtit allanik, sagluqiruallu inmiŋnik.

english: You, however, must continue in the things you have learned and are confident about. You know who taught you
inupiaq: Aglaalli ilivich ukpiġituiññakkich sut iḷisausiaġiŋaratin. Iḷisimagitin iḷumun itilaaŋannik, ukpiġiyumiñaqłutalu ittutin uvagut iḷisaurriŋaruaguut iliŋnik.

english: and how from infancy you have known the holy writings, which are able to give you wisdom for salvation through faith in Christ Jesus.
inupiaq: Iḷisimammiutin miqłiqtuurauniġniñqaŋa iḷisausiaġiŋagitin God-im uqaluŋi. Taapkua uqaluich kaŋiqsipkaŋagaatin God-im annaurrisaanik ukpiġiruni Christ Jesus.

english: Every scripture is inspired by God and useful for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness,
inupiaq: Qanuq iluqaisa Bible uqaluŋich God-im puttuqsrisiqaqtiłługich iñuich aglaktinŋagai, aasii uqaluich anniqsuutaurut iḷisaurriruni ilaan iḷumun ittuaŋanik, iḷitchuġipkaġniaqtuniḷu iñuich killukuaġutiŋiññik iñuutchimiŋni, natqiksruġniaqtuniḷu, suli iḷisaurriruni nalaunŋaruakun iñuuniaġusiksramik,

english: that the person dedicated to God may be capable and equipped for every good work.
inupiaq: iñuk savaurriruaq God-mik itqanaitquvlugu piyumiñaġluni qanusipayaanik nakuurualiqiniġmik.

english: From Paul, a slave of God and apostle of Jesus Christ, to further the faith of God’s chosen ones and the knowledge of the truth that is in keeping with godliness,
inupiaq: Ukua tuyuutit qairut uvamniñ Paul-miñ, God-im kivgaŋaniñ, suli Jesus Christ tiliraunikun iḷitchitquraŋaniñ. God-im piksraqtaaġiŋagaaŋa aasii tilivḷuŋa ikayuquvlugich ilaan iñuksraqtaani, ukpiliquvlugich iḷisautilugich iḷumun ittuanik uqaluŋmiñik iñuupkaiḷḷaruanik god-iliqinikun

english: in hope of eternal life, which God, who does not lie, promised before the ages began.
inupiaq: iñuuyumaliquvlugich isuitchuamun. God-im suuramikunnii saglulaitchuam unniqsuqłiiŋagaatigut taavrumiŋa iñuggunmik nunaunnii isagutiŋaiñŋaan,

english: But now in his own time he has made his message evident through the preaching I was entrusted with according to the command of God our Savior.
inupiaq: aasii piviksraq nalautinman taamna salapqiŋagaa tusaayugaaġiksuatigun uqaluŋmigun. Tamatkua tusaayugaaġiksuat qaisauŋarut uvamnun aasii God-im annaurripta pitqutaatun uvamnun alġaqsruutigigitka.

english: To Titus, my genuine son in a common faith. Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior!
inupiaq: Ukua tuyuutaurut Titus-mun, iġñipiaġataptun ittuamun qanuq atunim ittuamik ukpiġutiqaqłunuk. God-ttuq Aapa, Christ Jesus-lu Annaurrikput, naglikkutiqpaqaġli iliŋnun, tutqiutiqaqtillutillu.

english: The reason I left you in Crete was to set in order the remaining matters and to appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
inupiaq: Qimaŋagikpiñ Crete-mun, iłuaqsruquvlugich sut iłuaqsrugaksrauruat taamani, suli nalunaiqsitquvlusi umialiŋnanik nunaaqqipayaani. Itqaumalugich iḷisaurrutitka.

english: An elder must be blameless, the husband of one wife, with faithful children who cannot be charged with dissipation or rebellion.
inupiaq: Umialiŋnaq pasiñaġumiñaitchuksrauruq, atautchimik nuliaqaġluni, miqłiqtuqaġluni ukpiqtuaguruanik, uqautikkusiaqaŋitchuanik pialasuuniḷugich kamasulaiññiḷugiḷḷu.

english: For the overseer must be blameless as one entrusted with God’s work, not arrogant, not prone to anger, not a drunkard, not violent, not greedy for gain.
inupiaq: Qanuq umialiŋnaq qaunaksrauruq God-mun savaanik, pasiñaqtuksrauŋitchuq. Isumamisun piruksrauŋitchuq naaggaunnii piavsayaruksrauŋitchuq naagga taaŋŋaqtauluni naagga anayaitchuaguluni naagga piḷḷaturuaguluni.

english: Instead he must be hospitable, devoted to what is good, sensible, upright, devout, and self-controlled.
inupiaq: Aglaan umialiŋnaq tukkuuruksrauruq, nakuurualiqillatuluniḷu aŋalalluataqtuksrauruq inmiñik, nalaunŋaruaguluni piḷuutaiḷḷuni qaaŋiulaaŋaŋiḷḷuni.

english: He must hold firmly to the faithful message as it has been taught, so that he will be able to give exhortation in such healthy teaching and correct those who speak against it.
inupiaq: Umialiŋnam ukpiġipiagaksraġigai nayummatauluniḷu God-im iḷumun ittuat uqaluŋi iḷisausiaġiŋarani, iḷisaurriyumiñaġugluni allaniktauq iñuŋnik suli iḷisautilugich killukuaqtilaaŋannik tamatkua akiḷḷiḷiqsuisaaruat inmiñik.

english: For there are many rebellious people, idle talkers, and deceivers, especially those with Jewish connections,
inupiaq: Qanuq iñugiaktut kamasuutaitchuat iñuich sagluqinniktuallu taŋiġiḷanik uqaqłutiŋ, tamatkuałhaaq iḷisaurriruat nalunaiñŋutchiqsuksrauvlugu iñuk annaurrauniaqpan.

english: who must be silenced because they mislead whole families by teaching for dishonest gain what ought not to be taught.
inupiaq: Tainna uqaŋaiqsitaksraurut, qanuq maqutchirut tamatkiqł̣ugich qitunġaġiiñik iḷisaurrivḷutiŋ iḷisaurrutiksraġiŋisamiŋnik kanŋunaqtuakun sivuniġivlugu maniññaŋniaġniq.

english: A certain one of them, in fact, one of their own prophets, said, “Cretans are always liars, evil beasts, lazy gluttons.”
inupiaq: Iḷaŋat iliŋisa Cretan-miut nalautchaqtaat uqallaŋaruq, “Cretans ataramik saglusuurut, niġrułłuktun ittut, iqiasuuvlutiŋ niġġiqsunialgiñmiut.”

english: Such testimony is true. For this reason rebuke them sharply that they may be healthy in the faith
inupiaq: Taamna iḷaŋata uqallautaa iḷumun ittuq. Taamna pisigilugu suapiaġatakkich, nalaunŋasiyumaut ukpiġunmiŋni,

english: and not pay attention to Jewish myths and commands of people who reject the truth.
inupiaq: ukpiġiŋaiġḷugich Jew-guruat taŋiġiḷat unipkaaŋich, kamagiŋaiġḷugiḷḷu iñugruiññaich pitquraliaŋich ayyairuat iḷumun ittuamik.

english: All is pure to those who are pure. But to those who are corrupt and unbelieving, nothing is pure, but both their minds and consciences are corrupted.
inupiaq: Niqipayaurat piraġautchiḷḷu salumarut, akuqtuġnaġumiñaqtullu ukpiqtuaguruanun isummasiqaqtuanun nalaunŋaruamik God-itun, aglaalli sumik salumaruagitchuq tamatkunuŋa piḷuusiqirauruanun ukpiŋaitchuanullu, qanuq isumaqaġviŋich isumaŋiḷḷu salumaitchut piḷuktuaguvlutiŋ.

english: They profess to know God but with their deeds they deny him, since they are detestable, disobedient, and unfit for any good deed.
inupiaq: Iḷisimanigaluaġaat God, aglaan iñuuniaġusimiŋni naluruatun itkaat, naġġunapiaġataqtut kamasulaitchullu, nalliummatiŋitchut qanusipayaamun nakuuruamun.

english: But as for you, communicate the behavior that goes with sound teaching.
inupiaq: Aglaalli ilivich, iḷisaurriiñ nalaunŋaruamik iḷisaurrunmik.

english: Older men are to be temperate, dignified, self-controlled, sound in faith, in love, and in endurance.
inupiaq: Iḷisautikkich utuqqanaaġuqtuat aŋutit qaaŋiulaaŋasitquŋiḷḷugich, kinnaksaqtuagutquŋiḷḷugich, inmiŋnik aŋalalluataqulugich, nalaunŋaruamik ukpiġutiqaġlutiŋ, piviuttaqqutiqaġlutiglu, suli nikatchaŋiḷḷutiŋ.

english: Older women likewise are to exhibit behavior fitting for those who are holy, not slandering, not slaves to excessive drinking, but teaching what is good.
inupiaq: Tainnatun suli utuqqanaaġuqtuat aġnat iḷisautikkich iñuusiqaqulugich piḷuutaitchuanik, tiġliraqłiŋaiġḷutiŋ imiŋasiraġaŋaiġḷutiglu. Iḷisaurrutigiraksraġigaich sut nakuuruat,

english: In this way they will train the younger women to love their husbands, to love their children,
inupiaq: ayuġaksautigilugich niviaqsianun piviuttaġitqulugich uiŋich miqłiqtuŋiḷḷu,

english: to be self-controlled, pure, fulfilling their duties at home, kind, being subject to their own husbands, so that the message of God may not be discredited.
inupiaq: inmiŋnik aŋalalluataqulugich, piḷuutaitchuakun iñuutqulugiḷḷu, aimaaġviŋmik qaunaksriḷḷuataġlutiŋ, suli kamagilugich uisiŋ, God-im uqalua iñuich suuŋiḷaqsruŋitchumagaat.

english: Encourage younger men likewise to be self-controlled,
inupiaq: Tainnatuttauq kiaqsrukkich nukatpiat inmiŋnik aŋalalluataqulugich.

english: showing yourself to be an example of good works in every way. In your teaching show integrity, dignity,
inupiaq: Iliviḷḷiasii qanusipayaatigun savaaġiksuatigun tuvraaksriiruksraurutin. Iḷisaurriguvich pimmaġiksaapiaġlutin.

english: and a sound message that cannot be criticized, so that any opponent will be at a loss, because he has nothing evil to say about us.
inupiaq: Uqaluqaġlutin naġġuksruġnaġumiñaitchuamik, akiḷḷiḷiqsuqtitin kanŋutchaktitauyumaut, sumik pigiitchuamik uqaksraiḷḷutiŋ uvaptigun.

english: Slaves are to be subject to their own masters in everything, to do what is wanted and not talk back,
inupiaq: Iḷisautikkich kivgat kamagitqulugich ataniŋich suli iviġagniaqulugich supayaatigun. Kiummatiqaqtuksrauŋitchut ataniġmiŋnun,

english: not pilfering, but showing all good faith, in order to bring credit to the teaching of God our Savior in everything.
inupiaq: naaggaunnii tigligaġvigiŋaiġḷugich. Aglaan iḷisimanaqtuksraurut ataramik nakuutilaamiŋnik ukpiġnaqtilaamiŋniglu, uqautigilluataġumagaich iḷisaurrutit God-ikun Annaurriptigun iluqaisigun piramikkun.

english: For the grace of God has appeared, bringing salvation to all people.
inupiaq: Qanuq God-im annaurrisaa nagliktuutiqpaŋmigun iḷisimanaqsiŋaruq iñupayaanun.

english: It trains us to reject godless ways and worldly desires and to live self-controlled, upright, and godly lives in the present age,
inupiaq: Aasii taavrumuuna nagliktuutiqpaŋmigun ilaan iḷisautigaatigut iñuusiqaŋaiquvluta god-aiḷaġluta kipiġniuġutigiŋaiġḷugiḷḷu pigiitchuat, aglaan iñuutquvluta aŋalalluataġluta uvaptiŋnun, nalaunŋaruakullu god-iliqiruaguluta mattumani iñuutchimi,

english: as we wait for the happy fulfillment of our hope in the glorious appearing of our great God and Savior, Jesus Christ.
inupiaq: utaqqiŋŋapta niġiugivlugu quvianaqtuaq uvluq tikitchumaaqtuaq tautugviksrautikput qaumanġanik kamanaqtuam God-ipta Annaurriptalu Jesus Christ.

english: He gave himself for us to set us free from every kind of lawlessness and to purify for himself a people who are truly his, who are eager to do good.
inupiaq: Tuquvluni aitchuutigiŋaruq inmiñik uvaptiŋnun atanniqsimaŋaiqsitchaqłuta iluqaanun pigiitchuamun, ilaaguaqsaqłuta ilaan iñugisukłuta, kipiġniuqtuaguut nakuurualiqisukłuta.

english: So communicate these things with the sort of exhortation or rebuke that carries full authority. Don’t let anyone look down on you.
inupiaq: Iḷisautigikkich tamatkua, atuġlugu iluqaan ataniġnaqutin. Qapiŋaisaakkich suaglugiḷḷu naalaġniruat iliŋnik. Kialiqaa suuŋiḷaġiŋaiḷḷisin.

english: After God spoke long ago in various portions and in various ways to our ancestors through the prophets,
inupiaq: Qaŋapak taimani God uqaġuuŋaruq maŋŋuuptiŋnun uqaqłuni uqaqtimigun iñugiaktuatigun allakaaġiiksuatigullu piḷġutchisigun,

english: in these last days he has spoken to us in a son, whom he appointed heir of all things, and through whom he created the world.
inupiaq: aglaan makkunani aqulliġñi uvluni ilaan uqautiŋagaatigut uqaqłuni Iġñiġmigun, nalunaiqsamigun kiŋuvaannaquvlugu supayaanik, ilaan piqatigivlugu Iġñiq savaŋavlugich supayaurat.

english: The Son is the radiance of his glory and the representation of his essence, and he sustains all things by his powerful word, and so when he had accomplished cleansing for sins, he sat down at the right hand of the Majesty on high.
inupiaq: Iġñiġum salapqiŋagaa God-im kamanautaa, salapqiqł̣ugulu God-im qanuqitilaaŋa, nayummivḷugu sunapayaaq uqaluŋmigun suaŋaruakun. Ilaa salummautauganikami piḷuutiptiŋnun, aquvinŋaruq taliqpiata tuŋaanun God-im kamanaqtuam qiḷaŋmi.

english: Thus he became so far better than the angels as he has inherited a name superior to theirs.
inupiaq: Tavra kamanaqsił̣haaŋaruq isaġuliŋniñ suli God-im atchiŋagaa kamanałhaaqtuamik atiġmik ilaisa atiŋiññiñ.

english: For to which of the angels did God ever say, “You are my son! Today I have fathered you”? And in another place he says, “I will be his father and he will be my son.”
inupiaq: Qaŋaunnii God uqallaŋaitchuq inna isaġuliŋmun.

english: But when he again brings his firstborn into the world, he says, “Let all the angels of God worship him!”
And he says of the angels, “He makes his angels spirits and his ministers a flame of fire,”
but of the Son he says,
“Your throne, O God, is forever and ever,
and a righteous scepter is the scepter of your kingdom.
You have loved righteousness and hated lawlessness.
So God, your God, has anointed you over your companions with the oil of rejoicing.”
And,
“You founded the earth in the beginning, Lord,
and the heavens are the works of your hands.
They will perish, but you continue.
And they will all grow old like a garment,
and like a robe you will fold them up
and like a garment they will be changed,
but you are the same and your years will never run out.”
But to which of the angels has he ever said, “Sit at my right hand until I make your enemies a footstool for your feet”?
Are they not all ministering spirits, sent out to serve those who will inherit salvation?
Therefore we must pay closer attention to what we have heard, so that we do not drift away.
inupiaq: Tavra tamatkua ukpiġiŋakkavut naalaġnimmaġiksaapiagaksraġigivut taapkunaŋŋa tusaagayukkaptiŋniñ asiñuurrauŋitchumaugut.

english: For if the message spoken through angels proved to be so firm that every violation or disobedience received its just penalty,
inupiaq: Tavra isaġulgich uqallautaat taŋŋiqsaullaruq, qanuq tamatkua kamaksriŋitchuat pitquranik tatavsaqtausuurut nalliummatiruamik.

english: how will we escape if we neglect such a great salvation? It was first communicated through the Lord and was confirmed to us by those who heard him,
inupiaq: Qanuġluta uvagut annakkumiñaipiaqtugut ukpiġiŋisuaġuptigu kamanaqtigiruaq qanutun annaun. Taamna annaun uqautigiqqaaŋagaa Atanġum, aasii tamatkua tusaaruat qaaŋiqsinŋagaat nalupqinaiqł̣ugu uvaptiŋnun.

english: while God confirmed their witness with signs and wonders and various miracles and gifts of the Holy Spirit distributed according to his will.
inupiaq: Suli God-im nalupqinaiġmivḷugu aliuġnaqtuatigun, allakaaġiisigullu kamanaqtualiqiatigun, Ilitqusiġiksuamiglu God-im aitchuutaanik uvaptiŋnun ikayuqtiksraptiŋnik piḷḷuataqtilluta God-im savaaġitqukkaŋiñik.

english: For he did not put the world to come, about which we are speaking, under the control of angels.
inupiaq: God-im isaġuliŋnun aitchuutigiŋaitkaa nuna qaiyumaaqtuaq uqautigikkaqput aŋalataġitqulugu.

english: Instead someone testified somewhere:
inupiaq: Uqaluktuaguŋammiuq imma sumi,

english: “What is man that you think of him or the son of man that you care for him?
inupiaq: Qanuq taamna ilaaguaqsiruaġlu God-mun tamatkualu ilaaguaqtauruat God-mun iluqaġmiŋ atautchimiñ Aapamiñ maŋŋuqaqtut. Taamna pisigivlugu Jesus kanŋugiŋitkaa taigumigich aniqatinik,

english: You made him lower than the angels for a little while.
inupiaq: uqaqłuni, “God quliaqtuaġiniaġiga atqiñ aniqatiimnun, akunġanni aŋaiyyuliqiruat nanġaġniaġikpiñ.”

english: You crowned him with glory and honor.
inupiaq: Suli Jesus uqallavsaaŋaruq, “God-mun ukpiġniaqtuŋa.” Uqallavsaaġmivḷunisuli, “Uvaniittuŋa piqatigivlugich miqłiqtut God-im aitchuutiŋi uvamnun.”

english: You put all things under his control.”
inupiaq: Miqłiqtutaasii atunim timiqaġmata, ilaaptauq tainnatun timiniŋaruq, tuqqutikun suksraunġiġukługu Tuunġaq tuqupkaiḷḷaruaq iñuŋnik.

english: For when he put all things under his control, he left nothing outside of his control. At present we do not yet see all things under his control,
inupiaq: Suli Jesus tuquŋaruq iñuich sivuuġaruat tuqqunmik sivuuġaŋaiquvlugich tavraŋŋaaglaan.

english: but we see Jesus, who was made lower than the angels for a little while, now crowned with glory and honor because he suffered death, so that by God’s grace he would experience death on behalf of everyone.
inupiaq: Qanuq nalupqinaitchuq, isumaaluuttaqaŋitchuq isaġuliŋnik, aglaan kiŋuniiŋiñik Abraham.

english: For it was fitting for him, for whom and through whom all things exist, in bringing many sons to glory, to make the pioneer of their salvation perfect through sufferings.
inupiaq: Taamna pisigivlugu Jesus timiqaqtuksrauŋaruq aniqatiimisun, nagliksrauluni piḷḷuatautikullu aŋaiyyuliqsiqpaŋnun qaukłiutquvlugu savaurriñiġmi God-mik, naamaruamik akiḷiitquvlugu piḷuutiŋisigun iñuich.

english: For indeed he who makes holy and those being made holy all have the same origin, and so he is not ashamed to call them brothers and sisters,
inupiaq: Aasii ilaan ikayuġumiñaġai tamatkua piḷuksipkaġniaqtauruat, ilaaptauq nagliksaaŋavluni piḷuksipkaqtauniaġnikun.

english: saying, “I will proclaim your name to my brothers; in the midst of the assembly I will praise you.”
Again he says, “I will be confident in him,” and again, “Here I am, with the children God has given me.”
Therefore, since the children share in flesh and blood, he likewise shared in their humanity, so that through death he could destroy the one who holds the power of death (that is, the devil),
and set free those who were held in slavery all their lives by their fear of death.
For surely his concern is not for angels, but he is concerned for Abraham’s descendants.

Therefore he had to be made like his brothers and sisters in every respect, so that he could become a merciful and faithful high priest in things relating to God, to make atonement for the sins of the people.
For since he himself suffered when he was tempted, he is able to help those who are tempted.
Therefore, holy brothers and sisters, partners in a heavenly calling, take note of Jesus, the apostle and high priest whom we confess,
inupiaq: Tavraasii, aniqatitkaa, ilaaguaqtauvlusi God-mun, piqatauruasii iluqasi ququakkaŋasii God-im qiḷaŋmiittuam, isumalaaġutigisiuŋ Jesus God-im tiliŋakkaŋa aŋaiyyuliqsiqpaŋnun qaukłiuruaq ukpiġikkaptiŋnun.

english: who is faithful to the one who appointed him, as Moses was also in God’s house.
inupiaq: Ilaan piḷḷuatautiŋagaa God piksraqtaaġirini, Moses-tuttauq piḷḷuatautiqaŋaruatun God-im igluani.

english: For he has come to deserve greater glory than Moses, just as the builder of a house deserves greater honor than the house itself!
inupiaq: Naaggauvva God uqallaŋaruq Jesus nanġausiaqałhaaqtuksraunivḷugu Moses-miñ, igluqpiruaqtauq nanġausiaqałhaaġmatun igluqpiamiñiñ.

english: For every house is built by someone, but the builder of all things is God.
inupiaq: Qanuq igluqpapayaaq iñuum nappaŋagaa, aglaalli God savaŋaruq supayaanik.

english: Now Moses was faithful in all God’s house as a servant, to testify to the things that would be spoken.
inupiaq: Tavra Moses kivgalluatauŋaruq supayaatigun God-im igluani, kivgatun iłłuni, uqaqtuksrauvluni sunik taŋŋianiŋaitchuanik paŋmapak.

english: But Christ is faithful as a son over God’s house. We are of his house, if in fact we hold firmly to our confidence and the hope we take pride in.
inupiaq: Aglaan Christ iġñiġuvluni God-mun aŋalatchiḷḷuataŋaruq God-im igluanik. Aasiuvva uvagut igluqatigigaatigut, pigiuraġniaġuptigu ukpiqsimaaġniqput, quviagilugulu niġiuguraġniaġupta isuanun-aglaan.

english: Therefore, as the Holy Spirit says,
inupiaq: Tavraasii Ilitqusiġiksuaq uqallaŋaruq,

english: “Oh, that today you would listen as he speaks!
inupiaq: Uqallautauŋamman Bible-ni,

english: “Do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion, in the day of testing in the wilderness.
“There your fathers tested me and tried me, and they saw my works for forty years.
“Therefore, I became provoked at that generation and said, ‘Their hearts are always wandering and they have not known my ways.’
“As I swore in my anger, ‘They will never enter my rest!’”
See to it, brothers and sisters, that none of you has an evil, unbelieving heart that forsakes the living God.
But exhort one another each day, as long as it is called “Today,” that none of you may become hardened by sin’s deception.
For we have become partners with Christ, if in fact we hold our initial confidence firm until the end.
As it says, “Oh, that today you would listen as he speaks! Do not harden your hearts as in the rebellion.”
For which ones heard and rebelled? Was it not all who came out of Egypt under Moses’ leadership?
And against whom was God provoked for forty years? Was it not those who sinned, whose dead bodies fell in the wilderness?
And to whom did he swear they would never enter into his rest, except those who were disobedient?
So we see that they could not enter because of unbelief.
Therefore we must be wary that, while the promise of entering his rest remains open, none of you may seem to have come short of it.
inupiaq: Tavraasii, unniqsuqłiisaa itkaluaqtuq suli, isiġniksrakun ilaan unaŋuiqsiutaanun, anayasuktuaqta iḷaanni nalliqsi tikiñŋitpiaqtuq taavrumuŋa unaŋuiqsiġviŋmun.

english: For we had good news proclaimed to us just as they did. But the message they heard did them no good, since they did not join in with those who heard it in faith.
inupiaq: Qanuq tusaayugaaġiksuat tikiutiŋammiut uvaptiŋnun tainnatupiaġataq ilaiññun tikiñmatun, aglaan tusaakkaŋata anniqsuŋaitkai, qanuq ukpiġiŋaitkaat.

english: For we who have believed enter that rest, as he has said, “As I swore in my anger, ‘They will never enter my rest!’” And yet God’s works were accomplished from the foundation of the world.
inupiaq: Uvagut ukpiqtuaġuŋaruaguut isianiŋarugut unaŋuiqsiġviŋmun God-im aitchuutaanun ilaan uqallausiatun,

english: For he has spoken somewhere about the seventh day in this way: “And God rested on the seventh day from all his works,”
inupiaq: Tavra Joshua-m aullatiŋakpagich unaŋuiqsiunmun, God aquvatigun uqautiqaġayaitchuq allamik unaŋuiqsiġviksramik qakugukpan.

english: but to repeat the text cited earlier: “They will never enter my rest!”
inupiaq: Tainnainniġman aasii, imma ittuq Savaiññikun unaŋuiqsiġviksraŋat iñuŋisa God-im.

english: Therefore it remains for some to enter it, yet those to whom it was previously proclaimed did not enter because of disobedience.
inupiaq: Qanuq kiñaliqaa isiqtuaq God-im unaŋuiqsiġvianun nutqaġmiuq savaamiñiñ, God-ituttauq nutqaġmatun savaamiñiñ.

english: So God again ordains a certain day, “Today,” speaking through David after so long a time, as in the words quoted before, “O, that today you would listen as he speaks! Do not harden your hearts.”
inupiaq: Tavraasii isiġniḷupiaqta taavrumuŋa unaŋuiqsiġviŋmun, nalliqputunnii suksraunġiŋitchumauq tuvrautiluni tainnatchimun ukpiġutairrunmun.

english: For if Joshua had given them rest, God would not have spoken afterward about another day.
inupiaq: Qanuq uqalua God-im taŋŋiġuupiaqtuq suaŋŋatiqaqtuġlu, avikługik iñuuvlu pisuutaa, God-ivlu pisuutaa, savikpaktun avanmun kiiñaliktun ipiktuatun avguiruatun navyaaniglu patiġniglu. Suli isivġiiruq iñuich isummatiŋiññik pisuutiŋiññiglu.

english: Consequently a Sabbath rest remains for the people of God.
inupiaq: Suli God-im sivuġaani qanusipayaaq uumaruaq iriqsimaŋitchuq, aglaan supayaat aŋmarut tallutaitchullu irraŋnun ilaan isivġiiyumaaqtuam uvaptiŋnik.

english: For the one who enters God’s rest has also rested from his works, just as God did from his own works.
inupiaq: Tavraasii kamanaqtuamik aŋaiyyuliqsiqpaich qaukłiannik piqaġniqapta mayuŋaruamik qiḷaŋmun, Jesus-mik Iġñiŋanik God-im, ukpiqsimaapiaġataqta tuniqsimaluta.

english: Thus we must make every effort to enter that rest, so that no one may fall by following the same pattern of disobedience.
inupiaq: Qanuq aŋaiyyuliqsiqpaich qaukłiannik piqaqtugut isumaaluqataullaruamik suaŋairrutiptiŋni, uvaptiktun uuktuqtauŋaruamik qanusipayaatigun, piḷuksiŋaitchuqaglaan.

english: For the word of God is living and active and sharper than any double-edged sword, piercing even to the point of dividing soul from spirit, and joints from marrow; it is able to judge the desires and thoughts of the heart.
inupiaq: Tavraasii nalupqisuŋiḷḷuta qalliḷaaqta God-mun, nagliktuutiqaqtuamun, nagliktuusiaqaġumaugut aitchuusiaqaġlutalu nagliktuutiqpakkun ikayuusiaksraptiŋnik ikayuqtiqaqtuksraġuġupta.

english: And no creature is hidden from God, but everything is naked and exposed to the eyes of him to whom we must render an account.
Therefore since we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God, let us hold fast to our confession.
For we do not have a high priest incapable of sympathizing with our weaknesses, but one who has been tempted in every way just as we are, yet without sin.
Therefore let us confidently approach the throne of grace to receive mercy and find grace whenever we need help.
For every high priest is taken from among the people and appointed to represent them before God, to offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins.
inupiaq: Qanuq iluqaġmiŋ aŋaiyyuliqsiqpaich qaukłiŋich piksraqtaagurut akunġanniñ iñuich. Taapkua nalunaiqsausuurut pisitquvlugich iñuich God-im sivuġaani, qaitchitquvlugich aitchuutinik ikipkautiniglu piḷuutaiġutiksranik.

english: He is able to deal compassionately with those who are ignorant and erring, since he also is subject to weakness,
inupiaq: Aŋaiyyuliqsiqpaum suaŋairrutiqaqłuni araktuallagai piaqłuktautaitchuakun kamaksriŋitchuat naluvlugich God-im pitquraŋiñik, sagluqirauvlutiglu.

english: and for this reason he is obligated to make sin offerings for himself as well as for the people.
inupiaq: Taamnaasii pisigivlugu ilaa aitchuiruksraupiaqtuq ikipkautinik pisigilugiḷḷu piḷuutini pisigaluaġmiḷḷaisa iñuich.

english: And no one assumes this honor on his own initiative, but only when called to it by God, as in fact Aaron was.
inupiaq: Kiñaliqaa aŋaiyyuliqsiqpagulaitchuq inmiñik, aglaan ilaa nalunaiqsiqaġaqtuq God-mik, Aaron-tuttauq nalunaiqsaŋatun.

english: So also Christ did not glorify himself in becoming high priest, but the one who glorified him was God, who said to him, “You are my Son! Today I have fathered you,”
inupiaq: Tainnatuttauq Christ kamanaqsiḷiŋaitchuq inmiñik aŋaiyyuliqsiqpaŋnun qaukłiġuqsaġluni, aglaan nalunaiqsiqaŋaruq God-mik uqallaktuamik inmiñun,

english: as also in another place God says, “You are a priest forever in the order of Melchizedek.”
